If you happen to have any issue, the decision will be made against you and your money, even if you happen to be a long time customer!!! Absolutely nothing is taken into consideration. Most of today's websites have a feedback options on products and services. Wondering why ASOS doesn't???The answer is simple: ALL WOULD BE NEGATIVE !!!solution is simple: STAY AWAY

Title: Great service and products
Review: I love ASOS for a bit of shopping. Easy returns and a great selection. Thanks :)

Title: Fantastic service all round
Review: Would highly recommend ASOS. Been using them for about 2 years now, never had  a problem, deliveries always come on time, products are always great quality and also they give great customer service. Rang them up regarding a query on a return and was put through to an employee, who was very helpful, after about 30 seconds of being on the phone. Fantastic company

Title: Appalling customer service - would not recommend ordering through ASOS
Review: I ordered a top about 3 weeks ago on next day delivery, it said my parcel was being delivered and they sent me a text message asking me where they would like them to leave my parcel if I was not in. I told them over my back gate, however when I came home there was no sign of my parcel and the picture which they had taken of the parcel was not my house. I called up ASOS the next day and told them about my missing parcel they said they would contact the DPD to retrieve my parcel on Monday (2 days later) however I never received anything on the Monday not even a email. I contacted the customer care team voicing my disappointment with their service and they promised to have it resolved by that week. 2 weeks later I still have no parcel and I have sent numerous emails back and forth trying to get this problem resolved - Just want add they do not always reply to my emails I sometimes have to send a reminder! Finally on Tuesday I was told the DPD has retrieved my parcel and will deliver it to my address the same day. It is now Thursday and still no sign of the parcel and after send another email to them reminding them of my missing parcel, they tell me that they will send a replacement parcel of my order if there is the availability!! Shocking customer service if you ask me!Fair to say I am extremely angry and disappointed with the service that I have been given especially when I am a regular customer of there's. I will not be ordering through ASOS again.

Title: Late delivery
Review: I ordered a pair of 108 boots and they were suppose to be delivered 1st of December it's now the 3rd and they haven't been delivered I look on the tracking and the boots were in lod Angeles California where I live now all of a sudden there in Nevada I contacted customer service through email I'm still waiting for a response I won't be ordering from here again

Title: After shopping with Asos, I now know why I don't do online clothes shopping.
Review: Clothes look great on the models, sizes are a complete mess.. A 10 is like a 6!! a 12 is like an 8.. I have never Been so disappointed with a purchase.. I paid for next day delivery twice and lost out, maybe if they got their sizes right??  I don't know what their return policy is like as I've not been refunded yet, if they can justify their sizes then I have no faith in them whatsoever, I am a slim 8!!! Even a 12 was abit on the tight side.. This answers my question why I never order clothes online, thought I'll give Asos a go but never ever again.. Too much hassle, end of day why should I have to pay postage twice when someone in their marketing/buying department not checking their sizes!!!

Title: Never really had an issue other than a few products not looking the way they did online
Review: I've ordered from asos for years, nearly every time i've ordered i've never had an issues other than once when i ordered a suit from there and it was definitely not the same suit as in the picture online. I remember a few deliveries being a bit late but again as a whole they're pretty good at getting things to you on time.

Title: Trendy euro fashion
Review: I ordered most of my clothes from ASOS. It's free returns and the shipping from the UK to the US is free and fairly fast. Great range of euro fashion.

Title: Order not received.
Review: I placed an order with ASOS at the beginning of September, consisting of 10 pairs of shoes and 16 items of clothing.I received 5 pairs of shoes after weeks of back and forward emailing. They refunded me for the other 5 pairs of shoes as they said it was mistakenly returned to them. The 16 items of clothing was never received or refunded. They gave me many excuses, empty promises and kept assuring me that a resolution is near. Their reply to my last email on 27/11 informed me that the query has been closed on their side, even though I still have 16 items outstanding. They have in other words stolen my money. They have committed fraud! This company needs to be shutdown.

Title: So far so good...
Review: At first i got worried when i read all the bad feedbacks regarding asos coz it's my first time to order and im expecting 2 deliveries on dec 03 and dec17. I emailed(windirect/anchato) regarding my 1st package when can i receive them, because it was already schedule for delivery since nov 30 based on the delivery tracking. they replied to my email very fast and inform me that today i'll receive it.  and they were right i just got my package today, one day ahead from the delivery schedule.. Lets see for my 2nd package if there will be no problem because that one is not trackable. but for now im satisfied customer from singapore.

Title: Customer Service from Hell
Review: My parcel was not delivered and when I asked ASOS to send me other items or refund me they stalled, refused to escalate my complaint, lied to me about the fact that the parcel had been tracked. Was referred to ASOS by the Mamamia network who said that ASOS made everything so easy. Boy were they wrong. I asked for the contact details of a person within this organization that I could escalate my complaint to, because they kept telling me to wait 1 week before they would do anything about it, the customer service representative ignored my request (THREE TIMES) and gave me stock standard answers to add fuel to the fire. I paid them $189 and have nothing to show for it 16 days later and ASOS is not even going to try to remedy my complaint for 1 week. If there was a star less than 1 they should get it.

Title: Best online fashion store out there!
Review: Asos is not only the online fashion store that i use the most, it is the one that has the best range of choices and a very fast shipping. I live in Denmark and my clothes usually arrive within a week, which is great. I have never experienced any problems with them and trust them with a lot of purchases. I have only had to send something back once, because it didn't fit, and i got my money back right away when they received it. I love Asos, and it is definetely my go to store for online shopping.

Title: I'm Truly Shocked.
Review: So I orderd an item that hadn't arrived on time, so I sent an e-mail message, that it's been too long since my original date of arrival. ASOS costumer service just decided to BLOCK my account, and now I can't contact with them no more, and can't order from them no more from any account, they blocked my address too. What kind of a service is this? Disappointed!

Title: ASOS is love
Review: So far I have made 4 orders with ASOS, and the experience has been great. The items always come intact and are of good quality (even the books). Already did my Christmas shopping with them and I'm over the moon with the items and how fast the delivery is.I do know for a fact that they use Hermes (they're awful as carriers but that's not really the company's fault) as a carrier and that's why I always use Click & Collect either from a Boots store or the local off licence.The returns are also quite simple and fast unless you return something during busy periods like after black friday or christmas.Overall I'm very pleased and I will 100% order again and again.

Title: Great company
Review: Honestly cannot fault ASOS.The quality of everything on the website is of high standard. Their communication skills are excellent, always informing you on the current status of your parcels. Their refund process is easy and free. Every time I order from ASOS I know that everything will be done professionally and in a way that benefits the customer.  I had an issue with a faulty bag a couple of weeks ago, after sending them pictures of it and communicating about what to do, they sent me a full refund very quickly and were very apologetic about what had happened.  I believe they have one of the best customer services in online retail.

Title: Truly awful customer service experience
Review: Ordered several items on 11th November, items shipped on the 13th and according to tracking should have been delivered on the 16th November.They never showed and no tracking information was available.  When contacting Asos Customer Service I was lied to by several different associates.  Could never get through on live webchat, no telephone number to call and by the 23rd November with no refund and no parcel I was becoming increasingly more irritated but their 'could not care less' attitutde.  I eventually got an email and then subsequent refund on the 24th November,but I think that is only because I persisted in emailing them airing my grievances.  Now I know that things can sometimes go wrong, but what makes this company incredibly frustrating to deal with is the over the top 'friendliness'of their customer services, without actually doing anything to help.  They think that chucking in 'have a nice evening' and 'we love our customers' etc that they can pull the wool over our eyes.  Truth of the matter is not one of those people I dealt with gave a stuff about my situation or in helping me resolve it.  Needless to say I would not deal with this company again.  Am sure when it all goes ok they are fine, but as soon as you hit a problem, don't count on them to fix it quickly.

Title: Undelivered item!!!!
Review: Dont buy from ASOS!!!!! Quite afew times they have got my order wrong or atleast delivered it very late, but this time they totally messed up. I ordered something for next day delivery a month ago and it still hasnt been delivered. I contacted them through email various times and have heard nothing. They dont even have a phone number you can ring, everything has to be done online! Plus i cant even track my order. And i cant get a refund because noone replies to my email!!!!!! AVOID ASOS AT ALL COSTS!!!!!

Title: Awful ASOS!!!
Review: I am appalled at how shocking the customer service is at ASOS. How is a company as incompetent as them surviving. I have been subject to rude, patronising emails about an item I received that was not onlyincorrect once, but twice! The dress I received was incorrect and returned only to be told it was out of stock, I then noticed the items name had been changed on the website after I had informed them of my incorrect order. I was told I would recieve a refund to which I did not! I had the exact same dress, in the same colour and size sent back to me, to then be told that 'although it is a little confusing this was in fact the correct item.' NO IT WAS NOT! After lengthy emails where ASOS would not admit blame, they finally acknowledged this and said I would recieved my delivery charge back on return of the second item. This has not happened...the dress was received by them but I was informed the paperwork was missing and they had no clue as to why I was returning the dress. And so my battle continues!!!

Title: Absolutely terrible customer service
Review: Ordered a bunch of things ready for christmas next day delivery, but 2 days later, I received only 2 items out of the 10 items I ordered. Contacted Asos about it to ask where the missing items were and what could be done. They apparently interviewed the driver in a few hours and weighed the order so for all they knew, the order was sent out intact and not tampered with. I double checked with my mail as it may have came in 2 separate orders however I did not find it therefore it must be a problem over on Asos side in the warehouse. I then asked if I could return the items I did receive and get a refund as who in their right mind would pay for items that they did NOT receive however they've just completely shut me down by closing my account for no reason after being a loyal customer for 4 years. They now won't reply to any emails in regard to this matter so now I'm put in the position where I feel like I've just been robbed of my money and can't do nothing about it. I will never shop on Asos again, terrible customer service! I would recommend anyone thinking about purchasing things from Asos to go to the high street or other online websites as I wouldn't want anyone to go through what I have just been through.

Title: Ok-ish
Review: Ordered a few dresses (for choice) for an upcoming wedding - 1 style was completely different to the photos online, one style wasn't great quality however one dress was lovely. Returning was easy, returned via courier who collected from my work on a day of my choosing. All in all, ok delivery and return however items are hit and miss....

Title: Very friendly and helpful customer service staff
Review: I had an order to return due to defects, so contacted customer service online.I was very impressed with how helpful and friendly the staff were, especially Deborah. It made my day

Title: Beware
Review: Clothes ok.They use Hermes delivery company and they are disgraceful.Asos custmer service are very bad too

Title: Good clothing, good conditions
Review: It's been a while since I use online stores in order to buy clothes. I think it is great in case you don't have time to go shopping (or don't like stores).  I've ordered 3 times in Asos and I've had no problem with it. The sizes are ok, they are pretty fast (around a week to get my orders) and the quality (at least of my pieces) is really good for the price.  And also, the possibility of returning the items is a good point for the company.  Fast and convenient, recommended!

Title: Unacceptable
Review: I placed an order for a few dresses a week before I was due to go away on holiday. One of the dresses was a different item to what I had ordered and I got in touch with ASOS straight away. I told them I was in need of the correct item asap as I was going away on holiday and was told that a replacement for the correct item had been arranged on express delivery. I received no confirmation of this and so got in touch again to be told the same thing, later the same day I was told the item was out of stock despite it still being available to order on the ASOS website. I got in touch again the next day and explained that the item was actually in stock on their website and was told that it would be arranged for next day delivery, again later that day I received an email informing me that it was out of stock in size XS but I could have it in a S to which I agreed was fine. The next day I woke up to an email saying the item was out of stock. I got in touch with ASOS numerous times through their chat option and was told it would be delivered that week and was then told I would receive a refund instead. I've now been told that the only way to receive the correct item would be to reorder it as they are only able to replace items of the same stock but as they've told me this 3 days later the item I originally wanted is now out of stock. I'm fuming as I would have ordered the item ages ago if I hadn't been told one was already on it's way. Upon asking for an address to send a complaint to I was told this information could not be provided. I feel that of the amount of people I have spoken to from the ASOS customer care team not enough was done to sort out my problem.

Title: Bad customer service
Review: My first purchase with Asos and also my last. When tracking my parcel with Hermes and discovering that they had marked my parcel delivered and signed for when it had not been, (and that's another story!) I contacted Asos to find out what was going on. I informed them (3 times!) that no one in my household had signed for it and it was not in any 'safe place'. I was then told that I should go knocking on my neighbours doors in the area to find out where it had been delivered to!!! When I said that it was not up to me to go searching for the missing parcel, I was repeatedly told that I HAD to do this before it would be taken any further. What started out as an issue with their rubbish courier service turned into awful customer service from Asos who clearly have no idea on how to handle a problem. I still can't believe they expected me to go knocking on doors asking people randomly if they had my parcel!! Wish I had seen the reviews for this company BEFORE I decided to purchase from them. Never again.

Title: Faulty product and lousy customer care chat  (Order no. 178773497)
Review: I bought approx. 20 pair of socks and 10 pair of boxer underware.The purchase session was easy. The time of delivery good. 4 pair of the socks were however not acc. to the homepage specification. Instead of 95% cotton it was mainly syntetics (90%).I accessed asos.com costumer care chat session to report this issue and find out what asos would do about this. Meet a person keep on asking questions about my account details which i stated exactly as these were. The person claimed that it was not correct. I informed order number. position on the order of the faulty item. My name, my email adress, my birthday, my address etc. The fault was not even an issue in the numerous line of questions.Suddenly the chat hung up.

Title: WILL NOT SEND REPLACEMENT ASOS
Review: Bought a coat from asos, the wrong item was sent so i contacted them on sunday by customer care live chat, she reassured me that a replacement item would be sent within 48 hours and by next day delivery which was great so sent back the unwanted item on monday the 23rd as directed by customer care, tuesday came and nothing so contacted customer care again and she said oh this item has been sent out for you but not next day delively just standed, then i explainted that i checked and the item was still  Processing then i was told it would definitely be sent today the 25th November BUT surprise surprise STILL NOTHING, just contacted customer care and now there not responding to me.. i am sick and tired off been promised by ASOS there sending my replacement and ignoring me now Please can someone help me get this sorted as its causing me a lot off distress...!!!

Title: a company that has gone downhill
Review: I used asos quite frequently and thought their products, website, cost and delivery services were good.Recently I selected a nominated day delivery as I needed the product quickly and on the day I knew I was in. According to asos I selected the following week leaving a week and a half from purchase. The delivery charge was over £5.00, when I asked where my order is I was told the wrong day was selected. Customer services agreed to refund delivery charge via written correspondence then refused as it was my mistake - given the delivery was so expensive I couldn't believe it was based on a lead time of over a week. Asos refusing to refund the delivery has cost them £100 of pounds from a frequent customer and another bad review.

Title: a company that has gone downhill
Review: I used asos quite frequently and thought their products, website, cost and delivery services were good.Recently I selected a nominated day delivery as I needed the product quickly and on the day I knew I was in. According to asos I selected the following week leaving a week and a half from purchase. The delivery charge was over £5.00, when I asked where my order is I was told the wrong day was selected. Customer services agreed to refund delivery charge via written correspondence then refused as it was my mistake - given the delivery was so expensive I couldn't believe it was based on a lead time of over a week. Asos refusing to refund the delivery has cost them £100 of pounds from a frequent customer and another bad review.

Title: PATHETIC!
Review: This was my first experience with ASOS. I placed an order on the 12th of November and got a confirmatory mail telling me that the order will be fulfilled by the 23rd. I kept tracking my order to see the status and As of 21st November it was still stuck on 'package held for pre processing'. Worried that I won't  receive my order on time, I contacted customer care and the representative assured me that the order will reach me on the date promised by them.And today, on the 24th of November, I get a mail from them saying that my order has been cancelled because "the carrier did not receive a photographic ID" and that its on their way back to them. I can only receive my refund 5-10 working days AFTER it's been received by them.What rubbish! Why wasn't I informed upon placing my order that an ID was to be provided? And how exactly is it my responsibility to get it across to a carrier selected by YOU? And why did the customer care representative NOT inform me of this even after having access to my order details and status?Disgusted by how unfair the situation is, I sent customer care a mail about how I need a refund immediately and will definitely not be waiting over a fortnight for it. I get an auto-generated mail from them saying I've reached an "unattended mail box" and also gave me "some handy tips" that may help me with my "query". Ha, I bet! Judging by the terrible reviews on this site I don't think I'll be getting my refund for a long long time (if at all). Well, this definitely is not my final word on the matter! I will keep reposting this review until and unless I get a full refund from this company.

Title: WASTE OFF MONEY
Review: Bought a coat a week ago had to go away for a few days when i came back i opened it to my horror it was the wong item that was sent because its outside there return time frame, i cant send back now im stuck with something i cant wear so annoyed waste off money!!!

Title: Great!
Review: I've had ordered from the shop many times. Everytime, everything has been as it should. Going to buy from the shop again.

Title: GREAT SERVICE
Review: Been a member for many years and you can not simply get free next day delivery even over Saturdays and Sundays anywhere else. Good for last minute outfit or gift source. The only thing bothering me is they keep changing couriers when i find DPD is the their most reliable service rather then UK Mail or Hermes who drop parcels all over the place

Title: Worse Service ever!
Review: I ordered something with Asos the other day and wanted to get it delivered the next day in the evening, obviously ASOS was pretty fast with taking my money from my account. The next day my ordered didnt arrive, so I had a live Chat with a guy the next day which was a Friday. He said that they will start an investigation with Royal Mail which can take up to 5 business day (by today we passed the 9 days). I was upset but I agreed to wait ( what else should I do as I wanted to have my money back). Strangely he told me that I signed for my parcel, which I haven't. When I asked to see a copy of the signature he said he cant provide it. So far I had to be the one to get in touch with ASOS and their brilliant customer service, and so far most of the time I got the same rubbish response. No answer to my question no nothing. Just a it will take longer and we are very sorry. Seriously is this how you treat your customers?? I wanna know when this great investigation is finally over and when I can get my money back! Do yourself a favor and never order with ASOS, accept you like rubbish service. Seriously I could have a more productive conversation with a wall then with their customer service.

Title: Worst customer service I've ever received
Review: I am so disgusted with the customer service I received with ASOS. This is what happened:  I ordered my boyfriend's 19th birthday presents with them. I have recently moved to Birmingham so my old address (his address) was still my saved address on my ASOS account. Not even thinking, I placed my order. He'd wanted these t-shirts and socks for months but could never afford it as he doesn't earn much money and neither do I so I saved up my money just so he could have an amazing birthday present.  Without thinking I pressed order and then after about an hour, something clicked and I realised I had sent it to his address! I panicked and called your customer service team. The woman I spoke to was not very personable at all and she sounded like she couldn't of cared less about my issue. She told me because it had been an hour after I had ordered, I could not change my address which seems completely stupid to me. She told me to call back as soon as my order had been dispatched and tell them the courier service and they would email them and get it changed immediately for me.  I called back the next day after my order had been dispatched and spoke to a different man. I had updated my address on my account by this point but he kept telling me I hadn't. He changed it manually for me. He then REASSURED ME that he would sort it and that he would email Hermes and tell them to redirect the parcel. It had not left the warehouse by this point.  Confident my issue had been solved, I waited and waited. I had told my boyfriend to open all parcels and letters sent to the house in case anything was important and because ASOS had reassured me the issue was sorted I didn't think to tell him not to. I receive a text from my boyfriend asking me why I had ordered these t-shirts and socks and asked if they were for him. I had to tell him. It completely ruined everything for me. His birthday has now been ruined and the surprise has been ruined. His birthday isn't for another month. ASOS promised me that the issue had been sorted and it hadn't. I won't even get onto the disgusting customer service I received from Hermes when I messaged them asking why it hadn't been changed after the parcel turned up.  I'm so upset because I worked so hard to get my boyfriend these presents and the whole day has been ruined now. I was looking forward to seeing his face when he opened the presents as we barely see each other anymore and now he has nothing to look forward to.  Thanks a lot ASOS.

Title: Waste of time
Review: I spent nearly all day trying to sort my order out, and I had nothing in return for the inconvenience they caused me.  Firstly, I went ahead and spent over £100 just to get next day delivery... Because I needed the items asap. I then applied my 10% student discount code. It went through and I paid for my order.  The following day I was expecting my parcel, to then receive and email telling me that I wouldn't be getting it that day.. But the following day. There was no explanation given, until I had to prompt someone to tell me. It was due to a technical glitch. Fine whatever, that happens. I then got another email later that day to be told that one of my items is out of stock and I am now going to receive a refund? Well why was that item displayed in the first place and how comes I could still pay for it? Due to this error it was the cause of my parcel delay. All they could do was apologise and give me a 10% off code for another order.  Well I can already get 10% with student discount and why do they think I would ever be shopping with them again? Very very unreliable service and it took me about 4 different customer service members to finally be allowed to have all my items returned from the courier, rather than wait for it and return it all myself. I just didn't want my items at that point, I had enough with it.  I wish I had read the reviews before I spent my money with them and I would not recommend them.

Title: An absolute shambles of a company
Review: I have just had thee worst experience of any online shopping I have ever done, and believe me I have done a lot. The whole thing was a disaster, all stemming from their inability to listen to what they customer is saying. They are always right and don't care about anything else. I had the misfortune of dealing with their customer service team on several occasions and the lack of intelligence is astounding. There is a culture of reply to email and delay delay delay at all costs instead of taking the time to resolve the issue. I waited from 20 October til 13 November to get a refund for a returned item. It's already been sent they say, have another look! I send bank statements, PayPal statements, all to no avail. Eventually I got to speak with someone with a glimmer of intelligence via Twitter and everything was sorted, money received. However too much has happened and I will never shop with asos again. To be made to feel like a liar on multiple occasions by a store that I am giving my hard earned money to is unacceptable and in this climate, there's plenty more fish in the sea! SHOP SOMEWHERE ELSE AND SAVE YOURSELF THE BOTHER UNLESS YOU CAN WAIT WEEKS ON A REFUND AND ARE HAPPY TO HAVE TO BEG FOR IT

Title: Over it.
Review: Still waiting on a refund from almost a month ago, since I was sent the wrong sizes.  E-commerce in 2015 is way too competitive to be this lackluster.

Title: Don't waste your time...
Review: Ask for an exchange and get a refund in ten days. When customer services were emailed I received no apology for the inconvenience just told to buy the item again in the correct size. When questioned why has this happened? I was advised this happens regularly if the item is out of stock or of a different colour. (I know this wasn't the case when on the product as I checked daily.) Do they not understand people don't have another £100 to spend whilst waiting up to 10 days for a refund?  I'll be returning the rest of my order and spending my money with a more competent company.

Title: Horrifying experience. Never again.
Review: I ordered a dress, along with 6 other girls to wear in a wedding as a bridesmaid. 21 days have gone by and according to my local post office the tracking number they gave me is false. It still hasn't been shipped out to me. I've been emailing back and forth to the company. Which gives me generic emails like "so sorry that you have to wait a little longer for your package" and we're currently "investigating" the issue. They refuse to give me a phone number or offer any solutions. I will NEVER order from their company again.

Title: Was hesitant but absolutely recommend!!!!
Review: My package came exactly on time and the clothes are just like they're advertised. Will be buying from asos again :)

Title: Wrong item dispatched
Review: I think I got someone else's order. Reading the reviews on here it seems that nobody gets the item they ordered. Rather shocking performance for an online retailer!

Title: Wrong colour delivered
Review: My item looked nothing like the photo on the website. It wasn't even the same colour. ASOS were unhelpful in resolving their mistake. This was my first experience with ASOS. I won't be using them again.

Title: Two sizes big, button missing, and pockets SEWN SHUT
Review: I ordered a navy toggle coat from ASOS after I had been looking all over for one. I purchased it because it was on sale for a good price and looked better than the $200 and $300 coats I seen elsewhere! The size 8 was sold out so i ordered size 6 and thought it would be fine. Shipping came on time, but when i opened the coat and tried it on, it was at least two sizes too big! And I ordered down!! It was down to my mid thighs yet the model had her jacket stopping near her hips. This is an ASOS brand coat so the size guide should have been accurate, but it was extremely off. Upon further inspection, I saw a loose button inside the bag and realized it popped off the jacket! I also tried to put my hands inside the pockets, and they were sewn shut! These were not decorative pockets as the info states that there are usable side pockets and the model had her hands in them in the website pictures. I was just amazed at all the things that were wrong with this jacket and very saddened as I had been so excited to recieve it for winter. I usually never send things back, but I can't even try to make this coat work. And I won't let $100 dollars go to waste. Unfortunate, but I'll definitely be more wary about shopping here again. At least returns are free.

Title: Excellent service
Review: Asos has great customer care and provides really good service.

Title: Didn't have my item in stock
Review: I ordered a pair of boots during their sale only to receive an email 4 days later to say the shoes were not available. Disappointed but realised sometimes someone has got in there just a few moments before me. Overall my experience with Asos has been a good one.

Title: Absolutely horrible
Review: I ordered about 5 items, the shipping was great I got the items fast, as for the actual clothing, HORRIBLE!!! When I first opened the items, one of the shirts that I purchased was broken, the chain that was attached to the shirt was detached. That didn't bother me as much, I didn't care to send it back, but what really got to me, is when I finally washed & dried the shirts, they all shrunk, they no longer fit me, and I will no longer buy from here again.

Title: Positive experience
Review: I have only ordered off this website once, two dresses for $40 (free shipping). Both dresses fit. A colleague at work orders from Asos regularly and has been successful returning items if they don't fit. Would recommend.

Title: Why so bad rating?
Review: ASOS sent me the stuff I ordered, everything was fine, the prices, the quality - the same as on the website, everything was really great! However I had to return my brogues since they were somehow faulty. First I sent a picture if it's normal or not - ASOS replied that it looks weird and that they will send a new pair or I'll get a full refund - even for the shipping back. Do you flippin' understand that this is the best service you can get if you buy something on the internet? Wake up people, you are making me sick, go ASOS! Will definitely buy something there in the future.

Title: Great service
Review: Ordered a T-shirt from them. It was dispatched the next day, with an email from their courier service saying they have been made aware of my order and it'll be with me soon.  Selected the regular "before Friday" shipping and it delivered today, on Tuesday.  Very pleased and well fitting top

Title: Rubbish!
Review: Ordered for next day evening delivery. An outfit needed urgently. I received a text message to say it will be delivered between 6pm and 10pm it never showed up. When contacted asos they said they will be in touch in 48 hours. Not good enough especially after paying £7.95 for next day evening delivery. Won't be using again.

Title: Fab!
Review: Every time I order with Asos my delivery always comes earlier than expected, this time I only paid for standard for delivery but was delivered within two days of ordering, absolutely perfect service! Clothes looked just like they did online, could not recommend more highly.

Title: I love Asos - but not their My Mail courier service
Review: Asos is fantastic  - customer services is excellent,  their  web and app online shops easy to use and place orders, their selection of goods and labels -  great.   Their courier service My Mail, however, lets them down 'big time'. If Asos switched to a reliable,  efficient  and professional  courier service they would be one of the top online retailers out there - if not  the  top retailer.  It's  a shame the company is getting poor reviews because of one element of its service, but it's  understanable. I love having  so much choice and being able to order up to midnight for next day delivery BUT Asos needs a courier that can then keep their promises, and deliver the goods on time.

Title: Unsatisfactory
Review: The order not only came 3 days later than the promised ,before or on date ,but they also sent me the wrong size .I ordered a 12-13 and I got a 9-10 .I thought about giving them a second chance but looking at the other reviews besides mine suggest that thats a bad idea .DO NOT SHOP AT ASOS!!!

Title: Not Asos fault but delivery company's
Review: I ordered for next day evening delivery, paid extra for this as well, I am premier delivery customer but I needed my items delivered after 6pm as I was working during the day. I waited until half 9 in the evening and what I see on the tracking page is that apparently I failed to accept the delivery even though nobody knocked on the door! And I've got a big dog that always barks when someone knocks... I immediately tweeted to Asos helpline and honestly that is the best thing to do, you probably won't be able to get hold of the delivery company, they don't bother much, trust me... Direct message Asos on Twitter and let them know your tracking number, date of birth and your e-mail address and they will get hold of them. They've told me that the driver 'knocked on white door with glass' but my door is brown, lol! Well anyway, I got my items the next day and earlier than expected! I was a little scared to be honest as I spent quite a bit for this and I have read some horrific reviews on how people never got their stuff or their money back. If you are ordering for next day delivery make sure you do it as early as possible and opt for daytime delivery as it's more safe.

Title: NEVER AGAIN will buy from them!
Review: It seems ASOS NEVER keep to their promised delivery committment regardless of if you pay for express (did so for my 1st order and got the parcel after promised delivery date) but customer service was good so decided to give them a 2nd try. BIG MISTAKE! decided to follow their timeline and choose a standard as i ordered way in advance of when i need the items. Of course, the items did not arrive. A check with customer service again say the item will be delivered more than 2 weeks after the committed delivery date. 1 whole week after when i needed the items for! Extremely bad service. Never will i order from them again. Not worth paying for the stress they always give me on delivery.

Title: Love!
Review: Love asos only ever had one problem and they resolved it for me instantly. I have always received brilliant service!

Title: Don't know why I gave them a second chance  - WRONG ITEMS
Review: I never write reviews but I felt the need to since ASOS obviously doesn't know how business is made.  *First time ordering - The picture didn't match the item. Bad customer service.*Second time ordering - Sent the wrong item - yet to see customer service. The other item did not match picture correctly either (much shorter in reality but whatever)... Also, my sister and friends has ordered from ASOS and received the wrong items several times. Are you kidding me? Is this a order- and hope for the best- site? With no other online-companies have I had this problem. You can never know WHAT you will receive when you buy from ASOS - it's a guessing game. I do not understand how this can be a problem when it seems easy to fix because all the other online-shops seem to be able to put the right item in the right box.....

Title: Happy with my orders and the service I've received.
Review: I have made many orders with ASOS and have always been happy with my orders. The few times I've had to contact customer service (incorrect item received once, returns not processed on time a couple of times) they have responded quickly and sorted it out straightaway.

Title: THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE
Review: I have been  a loyal  customer with ASOS for 5 years I place an order on line for $525 and I have always sign for my goods or the leave me a card to collect it from the post but this time they left it out side the door and we where not home we did not get home till late that day /night and no parcelI have send them more then 10 emails /messages and every respond is a different story they asking me to give then a different address to refund me my money.Yes am going to buy another house how stupid they are.They never thought that I have been buying from them for 5 years they customer   service is very poor and you will go t.hrough hell . I have file a complain with the Fear Trading and I will let people know not to buy  from them.

Title: Rubbish
Review: Would give 1 if I could!! Don't become a premier member ... Next day delivery what a joke 3 days later and they say they are going to process my order within the next 2 days what a joke!! Customer care team members who don't understand social media and explain everything is out of their hands!!! Please aim to redeem yourself asos

Title: Return slip not included
Review: Had to go to fedex and pay to send my item back to asos. Was definitely misinformed. Not shopping on asos anymore. Never imagined paying to have an item sent back

Title: THANK YOU
Review: After publishing my review  few days ago, I have finally received excellent customer service from Alex at ASOS; who finally managed to resolve the issue for me. I have now received a refund as promised by him.

Title: I did not receive my order and I did not get my money back
Review: I have ordered dresses from ASOS. And I have been ordering from them many times already. And I have never been disappointed until now. I did not get my order from the post on Oct. 21  and they told me to wait until 29 October or maybe check with the neighbors and get in touch with the post office. I did everything as told but to my dismay, no dresses for me!  Therefore I send them an email asking where my order is, I got no answer. Then I send another one and another one and another one. No answer. I asked for my money back, no answer!  No dresses, no money. I feel so angry about this.

Title: BAD COMPANY! STAY AWAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Review: I purchased an item from Asos and the delivery guy put my item in an outside building that was wide open. When I got home it was obviously gone!! They are a joke and getting back to you, No phone number, just emails which i received an email advising 48 hours and it will be resolved! Now they are ignoring me and haven't bothered to help any further!!! Disgrace of a company! Trading standards here i come!!

Title: Satisfied costumer since 2006
Review: I've been shopping at Asos for almost 10 years now and I've only had good experiences. They have a very large offering on all products, the website is great to work with, most products have videos and all have very clear photo's and information.  Sometimes products from their own brand lack a litte in quality but it's usually pretty easy to spot before hand with the videos and photo's what will be good or lesser quality. It's not happend a lot but when I've had items I wanted to return that was never a problem and doesn't cost more money either. Although shipping and returns are technicaly not Asos their responsibilty I have never encountered any problems with this.

Title: Great service!
Review: My order was lost during delivery, but ASOS replaced the ordered items quickly.

Title: Great service
Review: I never have any problems when ordering on asos. Great service. Thank you. :)

Title: Love 2 shop!
Review: Thanks ASOS loooooooved my mew boots x x x sexy x x x thanks!

Title: ASOS - IS A FRAUDULENT SITE!
Review: Over a month ago I bought two watches on this website. One for my father, the second - for yourself. But I got nothing. NOTHING.When I wrote about this in the customer service, they promised to send me a replacement. But it turned out that this watch is out of stock and Asos decided not to return money. They just blocked my account. I was left without a watches and no my money. Today I appeal to the Internet Crime Complaint Center (FBI) with a complaint about fraud Asos site.People! DO NOT BUY on this site, if you do not want to lose your money!!! There are many reliable sites, with lower prices and good customer support.

Title: Delivery service going downhill....
Review: I have used ASOS for years and never had a problem. Standard delivery use to come within 2 days which was great, but now im currently 2 weeks along waiting for a delivery and can only contact ASOS via email with very limited response and as yet no resolution.  I am 7 months pregnant and waiting on some maternity clothes which are near on impossible to get on the high street unless you want to dress like your granny! Companies should NOT be allowed to treat their customers this way! There should be a someone to speak to rather than half arsed emails.  H&M have a really good customer services team and although their delivery is pretty rubbish also, it helps to be able to speak to a real person!! From other reviews on here it seems if everything goes your way then ASOS is a great site to use but if something goes wrong then youll be lucky to see the items you paid for or any return of your hard earned money - pretty worrying!

Title: Traumatising Service! Have been made to go to Court!
Review: On Wednesday 7th October 2015, I placed an order. This item was due to be delivered to my home address on the next day (Thursday 8th October 2015). However, I did not receive this item and was surprised to say the least, to see that the tracking information for the order had said the order was delivered and signed for. Upon seeing this, I immediately contacted ASOS Customer Care and after exchanging numerous emails back and forth, I was informed by  ASOS Customer Care that DPD had investigated and concluded that the parcel was delivered to the correct address and signed for  – according to DPD, an elderly woman possibly in her 60s/70s. I was promised that if, after a second check with neighbours, I still could not locate the parcel then a replacement would be sent to me.I responded to this citing that the information provided by DPD could not be true since there is no one matching that description in the household or in the neighbouring area. Therefore, I requested a replacement after a double check was not successful. After all this dialogue, you could imagine my bewilderment and astonishment to see that the next piece of correspondence I received from ASOS Customer Care was to tell me “We’ve investigated this fully with the carrier and driver in question. As it’s been confirmed that your order was successfully delivered and signed for, sadly we’re not able to replace this for you. If you have any other questions about the refund of your order, you’ll need to contact your bank.”Angered with this, I responded immediately questioning this conflicting email – I was just told that a replacement would be sent, why now could it not be sent? After exchanging further numerous emails with ASOS Customer Care , I became increasingly frustrated, angered and uneasy at how I was being treated – almost 3 weeks after the initial date of my order, I am £90 out of pocket with a missing parcel and nobody at ASOS seems to care. I have already been in touch with BBC’s watchdog about my experience and have been informed that they would investigate the matter. Under the Consumer Rights Act the goods remain at the retailers risk until they are received by me. Since they have acknowledged that I am not in receipt of my goods, legally they are obliged to refund me. I would advise anyone that has gone through a similar experience with this shambles of a company to use HM Courts & Tribunals Service Small Claims Court to retrieve their funds and also claim compensation.

Title: IDGF I LOVE ASOS
Review: At first I did read all these reviews.. so I was hesitant about ordering but I said F it I'mma order some clothing.. and it came in earlier than expected.. I'm seriously happy. ASOS can take all my money. ^^

Title: Difficult returning policy outside UK, but love the wide range
Review: I love the wide selection of clothes and sizes and I very much appreciate the larger sizes. I would state that Asos is the one of the leading online webshops with larger sizes that are still very flattering and on point with fashion. I am happy with the sales that are always going on and the few times I have contacted customer service I have not been disappointed with their response. Shipping is sometimes quicker than companies within Sweden.  HOWEVER, to you Scott below. Returns are NOT always free, like if you live in Sweden (like I do). If I order a pair of pants to the cost of $25 and want to return these I have to pay for that postage and shipping myself. A cost that will normally land around $20. So it is definitely not worth it for me to return those, and I am stuck with a pair of pants I can't use. Before I order I always have to do LOADS of measuring to make sure that what I am ordering will actually fit me.  I am also displeased with how the student discount only apply to UK countries but it's not really a big deal. I just mean, a discount of 10% would be nice but on smaller orders it doesn't really make a difference.

Title: People are so quick to judge. i love ASOS
Review: First...people complaining about the shipping...that has NOTHING to do with ASOS as a site - so i completely disregard your reviews when youre complaining about shipping speed....by the way, they do offer 2 day shipping if you're THAT worried about it....shipping has NOTHING to do with ASOS... Some of their "tracking" doesn't happen...for example sometimes i'll order things and it will just say "everything looks ok on our end" and sometimes it actually shows a tracking trail...but enough of that... Their stuff is great...the quality is prime -- the one thing is, most of the stuff i order, i have to order a size up, MOST of the stuff...so for example...my t-shirts (depending on company) i order Large...for my sweaters/sweatshirts i order a XL....heres my advice, if you are UNSURE about the brand and how it will fit you, order your normal size and also a size above...they offer FREE SHIPPING ON RETURNS so you cant go wrong... I've had maybe one time i had to contact customer service and my issue was resolved in a timely manner...some people just dont have patience and like to complain about everything... I live in the US so the fact that it takes 3-4 days (on average) for it to be shipped to me is OK with me...hell, sometimes it even has to come from the UK and i get it in a timely manner..but again, shipping speed has NOTHING to do with ASOS...and EVERY company will tell you to wait another week after the expected delivery (amazon and backcountry to name a few - both reputable sites). Their stuff is great, unique, can be pricey (but wait for the sales) and they seem to sell out of items fast so if you see something you like...GET IT! again return shipping is always FREE... love asos...thanks!

Title: Delivery Dates from ASOS not Reliable
Review: I ordered a white jumpsuit from ASOS for my bachelorette party back on October 8th,  noting that the delivery date was shown as "Delivered on or before Monday 19 October 2015".  It is now October 21st, and I don't have this item.   Even worse, when I contacted ASOS today, they said to wait until October 25th.  Umm what?  Why wouldn't that have been the delivery date shown when I checked out then?  Also, what good is that when I need the jumpsuit for October 23rd?  Even if I receive it tomorrow (22nd), that is still useless, as I need to have it altered to fit my height.  I needed it by the delivery date indicated, period. Also, I got this baffling message from their customer service: "As there isn't a tracking number available for this order, we can't see its current location".  What. Are. You. Talking. About.  How can there not be a tracking number?  So it just gets sent out from ASOS without any clue as to where it could be?  Terrible logistics and shipping policy.   Needless to say I will not be ordering from them ever again.

Title: Very poor quality & terrible customer service
Review: I bought the swimsuit for my holiday and the first time I wore the swimsuit, when I took it off, it had dyed my skin black! The whole of my torso was black and it had stained my skin and would not wash off! I had to spend my holiday hiding my black stained body. I contacted ASOS in July about the faulty swimming costume. I sent pictures and returned the swimming costume and was told that it had been sent to the garment technologist for investigation, but I didn't hear anything back and the query has been closed! This issue had not been resolved and I had not even had a refund! It was upsetting enough that this happened on my holiday, but having had my query ignored and closed, I feel is really bad customer service. I have since contacted ASOS care again, am being asked all the same questions I have been asked previously, and am not getting any further.  So bad!!

Title: Good Customer Service
Review: Don't understand all these bad reviews I have been using them for years and never had a problem, my favourite site to shop from. Next day delivery has always arrived next day and if I'm suddenly not in I can choose weather to have it re-delivered on another day I select or left in safe place / with neighbour. If I ever received something wrong in my order which is rare I just return it and get a replacement or a refund. I recently bought a pair of trousers that were faulty, told customer service and they replied straight away. They then sent me a replacement pair on next day delivery before I had even had time to return the other pair.

Title: Not a bad word to say about it.
Review: Always always always order from Asos.com it is my 100% go to website when I need new clothes.  The quality is amazing. The price range is fab and they have all the new in trends as well as look books to get style inspiration from.  Cannot fault the website at all.

Title: Worst experience ever
Review: A little synopsis of what has occurred: - Ordered a pair of shoes - arrived damaged- Sent them back and asked for a replacement - arrived damaged again- Sent them back - was told for days that the warehouse 'was investigating' - Shoes arrived - completely the wrong pair - I email to complain - told I have been refunded - Complain through my DMs - told I have not been refunded - Ask for a callback as a matter of urgency - absolutely nothing.  65 pounds out of pocket after 4 weeks.  Simple terrible and unacceptable.

Title: Poor customer service with little to no after sales support
Review: Let me start by saying I am a regular online shopper and have even bought from ASOS many times in the past. But fortunately, up until this point I had never had an issue with an order.  Ok so here are the issues I had in the order process - - Added a new address and selected it on checkout but the email said it was coming to the original address and not the newly added and selected one.  - Said in checkout process that orders over £100 get 'free next day delivery', so I selected that option. At the end of the checkout process and it wasn’t a free option anymore.  - They leave my suit outside, wedged behind my bin while I am away for the week.  The responses given by ASOS - I must have clicked back in my browser and lost the correct address details which is absolute scripted rubbish.  - Was told by them that they couldn’t give me next day. I should have paid the £6 and they would have refunded me. I assumed it was just added on automatically. This is basically a broken feature in the checkout process, but also totally falsely advertised because it is not available to the customer.  They said a few times to contact them but this seems like a pointless venture 99% of the time. You can’t speak to anybody on the phone and the people or person on the twitter account are just a joke. No help what so ever. They then told me once the order was created they couldn’t redirect it to the address I wanted until dispatch and it was also to late to cancel and reorder to the correct address. Then on dispatch they told me they couldn’t send it to the new address because I hadn’t used it before.  So because I couldn’t change or cancel my order, my suit ended up outside wedged behind a bin (or as Hermes put it ‘a safe location') while I was out of town and couldn’t get to it. Luckily for me, a neighbour saw it and brought it in before the box got wet and the contents damp and dirty.  There is no 3d Secure card process but can't sent to new address, I could take anyones wallet and get myself some ASOS clothes send to anywhere but I want my stuff sent to the correct address and thats a huge security risk?!?! Absolute nonsense.  How they can have such a disconnect between their customer service team, warehouse and the courier (in this case Hermes) is beyond belief.  Now don’t get me wrong, I like ASOS, they sell good stuff but there checkout process is so buggy and the lack of customer service for such a big company is appalling. Its just a case of one foot not talking to the other all round. This is really not on for an online only company that is so hard to contact.   One of the things that made me most angry was there total disregard for the fact the checkout process is fundamentally broken and I even sent them screenshots to show this. I am a web developer who has built many online stores, so I know how to use a checkout and the fact that they should tell me, you have done it wrong is just not acceptable. Even say, I had put the wrong address in, I hold my hands up and say I got that wrong but what about the 'next day delivery'?  I was not at all surprised to come here and find such bad reviews. Its just a circle of frustration and stupidity with ASOS, absolute amateur hour. I suppose its just a case of you get what you pay for, sadly this time I felt really let down because I spent nearly £200 on a suit for my wedding.

Title: I can't fault them!
Review: I order from Asos all the time and they are really good, I have the free next day delivery for a year option which is brilliant and it always arrives on time! There customer service team is also really helpful, I've only ever received something wrong on one occasion, which seems to have been a website error with the picture not matching the title, and therefore the warehouse sent me the same wrong item twice, but in their defense the customer service team dealt with it really well and you could tell they were really trying to sort it out, in the end they took the item off the site in order not to cause the issue. TBH what they sent me in mistake was probably nicer that what I had even picked out, but I sent it back anyway as I didn't need it, and got a full refund. I order from Asos so much though and that's the only issue I've ever had. IMO they are one of the most reliable fashion online stores, and with the massive range it's always my go to. The quality of the items is always top notch too. I would definitely recommend them!

Title: Good experience
Review: I ordered Denim jacket (ASOS label) of USD 72 with free shipping on 4/oct/15. It was delivered to me on 12/oct/15. The jacket is of good quality and features as shown on website. Fabric, Stitching and metal buttons are of good quality. Fit is perfect for me.Shipping and India custom duty processing was done by ASOS’s carrier wnDirect. Denim jacket is dutiable in India so in this regard I received an email from ASOS on 6/oct/15 for payment of USD 20 as duty, which I paid through PayPal, after which the parcel was released by wnDirect for shipping. It was airfreighted to Delhi and from there it was delivered by local courier DTDC to my Mumbai address.

Title: Great
Review: I have shopped at Asos.com a million times, and never had a problem with them. Shipping is free, and fairly fast  - I always receive the item before the latest date they put.Easy return, when that occasionally happens.Love shopping there.

Title: Fraudulent Activity
Review: I bought an item from them. The item took exactly a week to ship to me. Meanwhile in the midst of waiting for my merchandise to arrive, i experienced fraudulent activity with my bank account.

Title: Poor customer Service
Review: I have for 5 days asked your incompetant customer service for help regarding some items I want returned, for 5 days now I have been promised a phone call from your call center and stil I have had no call nor help, I have sendt several mails and no help has been offered as promised! ( A phone Call )Is this really how your cheat people to keep clothes thay dont want?? The Items I have PAID for are all the delivered in the wrong colour!! Never have I been more frustrated and angry! Your company should get its finger out and start doing proper custermer service as I need my things returned before I am stuck with these poor and wrong items!!ASOS do your job!!!When can I expect your call!!!!????

Title: Overall terrible customer experience
Review: I placed an online order with a valid credit card and my order was cancelled by Asos indicating they needed additional information. They requested I provide a scan of my passport and credit card statement as well as data of birth.    Sending my confidential data is a security threat to me, sending this kind of data by Email is not secure and open to hackers for identity theft. Secondly, what does Asos do with a scan of passports and credit card statements? This is excessive and unacceptable and puts me in unnecessary risk of identity theft.  Their customer service was unable to provide any explanation of why this information was requested.  After several contacts with the company, they indicated they cancelled my order in error and asked me to re-enter my order online, further wasting my time.   Overall a very terrible and negative customer experience.

Title: Just as advertised
Review: I was hesitant to order with Asos seeing all the bad reviews on this site and others, but I suppose only unsatisfied people voice their opinion. I ordered an Asos trench coat, it came in the mail exactly 4 days afterwards (just as planned) in good condition. And the coat itself is just what I expected, not top quality but for 85€ that's what you get.

Title: 'Next day delivery' pfft
Review: Been waiting 10 days for my 'next day delivery'. Investigation was conducted with the courier which was meant to take '48 hours'. 3 days later still no parcel and no follow up from customer service. What an absolute joke.

Title: Waited in all day, 10.30pm and no delivery!
Review: Spent £280 and got next day delivery... Have a special occasion on saturday and needed the delivery, waited in until got a text in the afternoon saying delivery between 6pm-10pm got my husband to rush back from grandparents with new born at 6pm, now still sat waiting and no delivery or even a courtesy text/call/email to explain! Not happy at all!

Title: Rubbish service
Review: Ordered 3 times and 2 of 3 times they didn't deliver - can't pay to track their shipments Don't care about customers either - simple refund but what about all the time I spend ordering

Title: Amazing Service
Review: Paid for ASOS Prime and I love it, absolute life saver before I went away and free returns.

Title: terrible online experience
Review: The  shipping time is very long. After waiting for almost one month, I still do not receive the goods.  I believe it should be a lost case but they did not refund to me.  I will never purchase from them anymore.

Title: Fake Nike
Review: I received a pair of fake Nike Roshe Run trainers.I contacted the company and attached pictures of the shoes.The will not acknowledge that the shoes are fake and only return with company phrases such as "ASOS only stocks genuine and authentic items, bought directly from the brands so you can be sure the item you received was genuine."

Title: Good service
Review: I ordered a pair of jeans on Thursday evening and they were delivered on next Monday afternoon. No problems, no hassle, and I was able to track the order throughout. Excellent service and a good price. Recommended

Title: Fast delivery
Review: I have ordered from Asos a few times and my delivery has always turned up within the delivery window! Usually before the max waiting date!  Returns are easy for me to drop into my click and collect shop and are processed in a reasonable amount of time! Happy!

Title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Review: ON THEIR WEBSITE CLEARLY STATES FREE DELIVERY OVER CERTAIN AMOUNT. DOESN'T PRESENT THAT OPTION DURING CHECKOUT. I BRING THE ISSUE UP WITH CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY SAY JUST PURCHASE AND PAY DELIVERY THEY CAN REFUND IT. I CONTACT CUSTOMER SERVICE AGAIN ASKING FOR REFUND AFTER ORDER. THEY CLAIM IT WAS MY OWN FAULT AND NO SUCH OFFER EXISTS AND WILL NOT REFUND SHIPPING COSTS.  EXTREMELY UNPROFESSIONAL AND PATRONIZING TELLING ME 'THEY ARE SORRY I FEEL THIS WAY'.... I HAVE HARD EVIDENCE OF SCREENSHOTS OF THE OFFER YET THEY REFUSE TO ADMIT THEY ARE WRONG.  You'd think a large company like asos wouldn't be ridiculous and fight with me over a measly shipping cost but unfortunately that's not the case. Their customer service also needs to communicate with each other better. Don't tell me one thing and then pass my case around to 3 other representatives.

Title: Appalling
Review: The so called customer service most certainly has no customers in mind.  I have placed an order for 4 items with ASOS.  I wanted to return 2, however, customer service made these returns so difficult, that I am now returning all items at my own expense.  I asked ASOS about a return address but was advised that they are not permitted to give me an address instead I have to use their shipping agent.  Which company in the world will decline giving out their address (even if for tax reasons it is only a PO Box number).  Which mail order company in the world will prescribe a shipping agent unless the returns are free.   Don't be misguided:  ASOS returns are NOT free, hence I would very much like to choose my own shipping agent.  By now ASOS has had my $500 payment for about 20 days earning interest, this money will keep earning interest for ASOS, the company without address, until the returns situation has been sorted, which may well be another 20 days.  ASOS is doing well out of me.  I have been internet shopping forever, myTheresa, Neiman Marcus, Spanx, Lucky Scent, a large number of Dutch companies, never, ever any problems with returns, but ASOS a completely different story.  Maybe by providing MINIMAL customer service the customer is exhausted to that extent that keeping the items seems easier than returning them.  Good policy for the company, but certainly not user friendly.

Title: Professional, caring and helpful
Review: This review of Asos isn't about their clothes or the shipping. Since I live in Sweden it's quite obvious I'll have to wait a couple of weeks for my delivery to arrive. That's perfectly fine with me. What I want to do is write a short review of Asos's customer service department. I've been in contact with them through email a handful of times and they've always been wonderful. I'm not sure I can describe how nice and helpful their customer service is (well, I can write it in Swedish but I'm not sure how helpful that'll be to any of their non-Swedish-speaking customers) but I'll try. If you accidentally order two dresses instead of one and miss the window of time when you can cancel the order, the customer service people will guide you through the entire process. With a lot of patience and understanding. If your shipment is lost on the way to Stockholm they will apologize (even though it's not their fault!) and help you track the package. They'll make sure you get your goods in the end. If you happen to get a shirt instead of a skirt, all you have to do is contact them and they'll sort it out. It might take some time but who are we to complain? The men and women who work there are only human. They're not robots. They're doing the best they can and I can honestly say I've never ever encountered a better customer service. So, all in all, I'm always going to shop at Asos. Not because of the clothes (but they're nice too) but because their customer support is great. I feel safe with them and wish them nothing but the best!

Title: Professionel
Review: My experience with Asos is only positive. They have a very professionel and structured approach to orders and returns.

Title: Poor customer service; horrible delivery
Review: I placed an order for a suit with this company. After 3 weeks no sign of the suit, I emailed ASOS several times and they finally said that there is nothing they can do and the order is lost. And once it was found and returned, they will credit my money whenever that may be. Regardless, I blamed the courrier service and reordered the same item. Guess what, they addressed the item to the wrong addresss again (I found this information from UPS). So now my 2nd order will probably go around the world and go back to them resulting in 2 refunds (whenever they happen). When I complained, all i got was a 10% coupon. Blah!! They can keep that - wish i could give them zero stars. Do not shop here. Very unreliable

Title: Bad customer service
Review: I ordered two pairs of jeans that turned out to be of a totally different color than on the picture on the Asos website. I complained about it and heard nothing. I just received an email which said: "Thanks for contacting ASOS Customer Care; I really hope I resolved your query!" Normally I really like Asos, but this got me looking for alternatives.

Title: Terrible Customer Service.
Review: After purchasing with ASOS for a few years without any issues I had my very first issue. I made an order for a Sunday delivery before I went on holiday in which the order did not arrive. When I returned from holiday to my surprise the parcel stated delivered so I checked the tracking which stated signed for by Thomas and delivered at 9:30pm. I contacted ASOS customer service to be told this was my neighbour. After checking with my Neighbour which has no one by the name of Thomas living there I contact ASOS again.  The response I got from the customer service was so appalling I just have to show all. If you have an issue with ASOS they clearly do not care about customers, loyal or not.I shall never return to use ASOS. Read below the first response. This has continued and still no full reply from them after saying now on 3 occasions they are looking in this over a week. Hi, Thanks for getting in touch about your ASOS goodies.  I’ve had a look into this and can see that your order was delivered to your neighbour with the name "Thomas M". As your order has been delivered to and signed for by your neighbour, we’re not able to refund or replace this for you.  As you haven’t received the order, this is now a civil issue between you and your neighbour. I hope this answers your query. If you have any more questions, please let me know – I’ll be happy to help. Best wishes,  ASOS Customer Care

Title: Fantastic
Review: Ive shopped with ASOS for years, never had a problem with contacting them, always fast delivery, love their clothes and if i have ever have had a problem with something its been dealt with quickly!

Title: Fast shipping and great service!
Review: I had a positive experience ordering here. The customer service is awesome, I got answers to a lot of questions I had about my shipment and my parcel came in 9 days (I live in Canada) which is very fast since I chose standard shipping which only costed me 1.30. My dress came in the right size and great quality just as shown in the pictures. I will buy and shop from asos again definitely.

Title: Accessories and shoes
Review: So far so good!I have often bought accessories and shoes from ASOS without any delivery problems .Few times bought clothes and the experience has been different from time to time. I think it's hard to find the right sizes that fit as it vary between the different brands . If you have to send something back, it can be a long process , but I always got the right amount back.So I keep it within buying accessories and shoes , but avoids clothes

Title: It's been over a week, my parcels lost, and I haven't been issued a relpacement
Review: I ordered some lounge-wear from Asos, to wear during my time at University. I ordered with plenty of time to spare, at least 7 working days prior to my departure to University. I ordered on a Thursday, and apparently, my parcel had been delivered on a Saturday. Apparently, the courier they used; Hermes, decided to leave my parcel outside, despite me not giving them any special instruction to do so. So, either my parcel was stolen, or they didn't leave my parcel outside at all. So, when I contacted Asos via email to let them know I hadn't received my parcel, and they then sent me an email, in which they advised that I check a possible "Secure Location" that my parcel could have been left in, as well as check with my neighbors. I complied, but had no luck, as none of my neighbors had accepted the delivery, and I checked my front porch, as well as my back yard, but there was nothing there. Frustrated, I called up Hermes, which was very difficult indeed as I had to dig deep to find their number. Once I did get on to the phone with them, they admitted that the parcel had been left outside (I wasn't given a delivery note) and that if it is not there then I should contact Asos to issue a replacement, and that Asos must claim my parcel as a lost delivery. I then contacted Asos, via email, explaining that my parcel had been lost and that I would like to be issued with a replacement. They said that I would be issued with a replacement, and that I would have an email sent out to me confirming this (I still haven't received this email). I told them that I like next day delivery as a form of compensation for my hassle, as I was not at fault and I had very little time to spare. When I sent that email, I was sent another email, which repetitively stated that I check in "Safe Places" and with my neighbors to see if they have accepted my delivery. Now, frustrated and infuriated with their response, I sent them another email, explaining my disappointment, and stressing that my time is limited and there will be no one to receive my parcel when I go to Uni on Saturday. They then replied to me with an email in which they apologised and said that they can see from tracking information that my parcel is out for delivery today (Wednesday, 5 working days after my initial order). I then asked them for my tracking number, and the tracking number that was supplied to me was the same tracking number of my initial order, the one that had been lost. I called up Hermes again, to confirm this, and indeed, the tracking number that I had been supplied was of the previous order and a new tracking number should have been issued. I then asked them whether there was any delivery scheduled to me at all, and they couldn't find anything. I emailed Asos again, telling them that I had been supplied with the old tracking information, and requested that I am provided with new tracking information. Turns out, that no one had issued a replacement, and someone from their team stated that, going through the chain of emails, they realised that no one had raised a replacement, but they have done that for me now. I was still not supplied with any tracking information. After some digging, I found a number for Asos, and called them on Thursday, explaining the problems that I was facing. The individual on the phone said that he must talk to a superior about my parcel and I had advised him that I didn't have much time left. He said all that I could do was just sit tight and wait for an email. I waited, and once again, I was sent an email which advised that I must check a "Safe Location" or with my neighbors to see if the parcel has arrived. I called Asos again, the same individual picked up, and stated that he must once again speak to a superior. It is now Friday, and I'm meant to move in for University tomorrow. I am without my parcel, and without any information on what action is to be taken next. I can't cancel my order because what I ordered are necessities. But I don't have my order, and I'm left infuriated, confused and out-of pocket. If your parcel is ever lost, good luck, because Asos will do everything they can to get out of supplying you with a new parcel.

Title: Great bikini
Review: A received a perfect bikini top that looks exactly as it appeared in the picture.

Title: Cheap Chinese goods, poor service, no phone numbers...
Review: I purchased a suit for a wedding as part of the bridal party. The jacket had no tags on it and it was tiny, I asked for an exchange. "Stephen" was very friendly and promised an expedited replacement. After a week I contacted the company again. "Martin" was cagey and would not refer me to a supervisor nor give a phone number. Ultimately "Nafisa" said replacements were not allowed for US customers. I'm apparently stuck keeping this tiny jacket and normal pants. Beware, this is a foreign company with bad Chinese made products and no phone numbers.

Title: A great online shopping experience
Review: Loads of choice, good value, always quick delivery - thank you Asos!

Title: So far so good!
Review: I've fast become a fan of Asos. It's always a bit tricky to order from international sites (I'm from the Netherlands) since you never know exactly how the shipping will turn out. Asos, however, is fantastic.  The biggest plus and the reason why it's now my top 'buy from' site are its free deliveries and free returns policy. On top of that my deliveries usually turn up long before my orders from Dutch online stores, I can pay via PayPal, and the informative emails during the process and track and trace option are great. Hassle free, I love that.  My only con so far would be that the emails from Asos are really getting out of hand. I'd love to get the occasional email about new collections, but it's either opting out completely or receiving nonsense on a daily basis.

Title: One of my worst online experiences ever!
Review: I purchased a swim suit from ASOS in a size G.  I know this will unlikely mean anything to the male shoppers out there, but there is a sinificant difference in swim top sizing between a G and an F.  I received an F sized top. Long story short.  After submitting my complaint I received 3 different emails from ASOS, each as useless as the next.  Explaining that the item I wanted was not in stock, they don't change orders so I must have ordered an F, and finally that there is bra sizing differences between Canada and the UK. Having previously shopped in the UK, and currently living in Canada, I can tell you there is no difference in sizing when you purchase a G sized bra.  Size G is a G! Needless to say after 6 rediculous emails I am returning the entire swim suit at my cost.  I will never, ever waste my money at ASOS again.  If this had been the first time I had, had issues it wouldn't be so bad, but this is the second time they have screwed me over.  So done with this terrible company.  There are far to many good online companies out there to waste money on subpar service.

Title: Love ASOS
Review: I have shopped with ASOS for years and have never had a bad word to say, once my item didnt arrive, after informing ASOS they immediately sent out another one which reached me within days.Also their returns are free and super easy. They are 100% about making their customers happy.

Title: OK service.. not great
