Review: This was just "OK"Slow and items are so so.

Title: EXCELLENT
Review: LOVE THIS COMPANY.

Title: I am getting tired now
Review: I used to love Asos, and would check their website everyday.But now I am just getting tired of them. First off they delete the wonderful feature where you could compare the dress etc. sizing/measurement with your favourite dress etc. that you knew looked good on you. This was such a wonderful feature especially when you live in Denmark and do not get free returns, which mean you have to be extra sure that the stuff you are buying fits.I just got my new dress yesterday, and it didn't fit. Granted stuff like that happens, so I am planning on returning it. Usually that means there would be a sticker I just had to put on my parcel and then down to the post office and pay. But apparently that was too easy, now I have go into their website, pay there, then print something (not everybody has a printer dear Asos, so even more of a bother for me), and THEN go down to the post office.  What was wrong with the old way? Seriously? Also don't get me started on the fact that in Denmark instead of using our postal service they are using Bring, which mean you have to pick up your stuff the most random places.  I am sorry Asos, but all of this makes me want to find other places where returns are easy and figuring out if a dress is big in size or small is easy (being able to review a garment would make this easier, like almost all other online shops have). Hope you guys fix this, since gosh I used to love Asos

Title: Their shoes run small, they mess up orders
Review: Their shoes run small but their return policy is nice in the United States.But I ordered a two piece suit and they only sent me the suit jacket and a completely different pant bottom. I went to exchange the pants for the right ones but they claimed they were out of stock by the time I got around to it (4 days later). They refunded me for the bottoms, and i thought about returning the jacket too, but I didn't. I regret it since i never wear it. I've only had one successful purchase with this company.

Title: lack of customer service !!
Review: Way to long time before they react ón returned items ! More than 35 Worning days ???

Title: Good but slow.
Review: Took a while but I did get what i ordered.Good quality all round.

Title: Changed delivery
Review: I don't really know what to write here, since I have had very different results from this page. First of all, I live in Denmark, and I used to love asos, the delivery was great, I always got what I expected and so on, - and I would have lived to give them 4-5 stars for this. But the past year, their delivery has just been hell for me- and other Danes.. I don't know what they changed to, but whatever it is, it is just awful. Packages are damaged, people are rude, it takes sooo long to get the delivery, and now it's come to that I don't really want to buy from there anymore - it's just not worth the trouble... Which it really sad since I used to love it..

Title: love the one year next day delivery service for £9.99
Review: i buy from asos quite often and i absolutely love the shipping option they have for the year vip service, its great i wish other companies had this service available as well. :D Happy customer.

Title: Good
Review: Ordered many times. Allways on time, and returns are very easy.

Title: Nice dresses, good customer service :)
Review: I have ordered from Asos multiple times since last year. Most of the packages arrived within the set timeframe or a couple of days later, except for the last one. I waited for a set number of working days as required (28 I think?) and then emailed the customer care again, asking for a replacement. They have been very helpful and arranged for sending it to me, even though the size of the item in question was listed as out of stock. It's kind of strange that some people say their customer service is rude. In my case, they have always been very polite and willing to help.

Title: Delivery
Review: Delivery is absolutely appalling. Company rude, argumentative and downright shocking to deal with. Will never buy off Asos again !!!!!!!!!!!

Title: 0 would be the right score!
Review: If I could scored the service as 0; I would LOVEEE to! This is the worst online shopping experience I've ever had. I ordered an EXPRESS delivery, I paid 6 EUR more than the normal cost. It turned out that it exceeds the scheduled delivery; while in fact i will be away just the day after. This is so RIDICULOUS, since I am based in Netherlands which is only 1-2 hour flight from the UK; and when I checked it with the DPD Parcel company; they mentioned that my items were sent using CLASSIC / NORMAL delivery package; meaning no SPEEDY delivery should be expected. This means, I literally pay 6 EURO for NOTHING! When I called the CS, no apology even was mentioned. SUPER UBER TERRIBLE service.  THE WORST CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE EVER! I would NEVER EVER EVER use ASOS; and will inform all my friends and colleagues are aware of how poor the service has been. Seriously bad!

Title: Worst service ever
Review: So firstly I went through a lot of trouble ordering my things, then I ordered for next day delivery- sat in my house all day and the delivery never came. Next when I finally received my delivery one of the products was wrong. Now they're saying they can't send out the right product because it's out of stock, although I ordered it first!. Now finally one of the products have ripped after one day of owning it because I stretched and when I try to get in touch all they say is "we're trying to solve the problem, sorry for the inconvenience" and act like everything is ok

Title: WHAT A SCAM! Customer service is useless.
Review: Complete runaround! Everyone says that "they are looking into" the issue or that some other dept is handling it, yet nothing ever happens. Taking my money elsewhere. I have been arguing with them for over a week to offer their student discount.

Title: Worst service ever
Review: I ordered parcel Saturday night paid for delivery to be on the Sunday!  Waited between 6-10pm no one showed contact customer care who said was a missed deliver I was home no one had showed and if they had why would a calling card not be left! Customer care confirmed be delivered Monday 31/8/15 again no show after 25 emails back and forth customer care said would never have been Monday as bank holiday so had been arranged for Tuesday waited again and no show have now been told parcel returned as unsuccessful delivery and I have to wait 7 days for refund is this really a away to run a business obviously don't care about customer service just making money! Will never use again!

Title: Average Experience.
Review: I've only ordered from ASOS once but purposely ordered from the 'petite' range as I'm quite small and thin. I find it hard to order clothes online and was very excited to see they had a special 'petite' section.  I ordered about 5 different things and they all looked very nice in the photos, all on petite sized models and it fit them really well, looked really fitted and flattering so I thought this was how it would look on me also. However this was wrong to assume because I couldn't believe how large each item was upon arrival, they looked so small in the photos but were baggy and large in real life! None of the clothes fit me properly, they were all extremely long (came down to my knees when they were supposed to be mid-thigh) and baggy around the waist. One dress was an off the shoulder style and looked very elegant in the photos but in real life it kept falling off my shoulders because it was just too big. I was very disappointed as it was a beautiful black dress with lace sleeves. It was the same problem with the rest of the clothes.  I also ordered a pair of black wide fit platform heels (only kind available was wide fit) and they were bigger than I thought. I have small feet and ordered UK size 3 / NZ size 5 as this is my usual size but they seemed more like UK size 4 in real life and are on the verge of looking weird on my small feet. They are also made of leather and the straps cut into my feet, they are very stiff and I've tried multiple times to loosen the leather but it never seems to work or make a difference. As a result the shoes are quite uncomfortable and hurt when I walk in them.  I gave ASOS 3/5 stars because the delivery was pretty quick and also free (unlike so many other online shopping websites) and I did quite like one dress, I've been wearing it even though it's quite baggy. Although I don't think I'll wear the rest of my purchases so I feel it was kind of a waste of money as I spent quite a lot for each item.  Not sure if I'll buy from ASOS again, I can understand it might be great for non petite people because the clothes will probably fit better. But would not recommend this website to any petite people, even buying from the 'petite' section like I did.

Title: Not "As Seen On Screen" anymore
Review: I have been an ASOS customer since 2009 or 2010. The latest orders have not been as shown on screen. The colors are not what's described and the returning process is so much effort that you don't feel like returning it  It's disappointing when you have been loyal customer for this long and that the product isn't what it' seems

Title: SCAMMERS!!
Review: I have gone back & forth with these morons for over a month now via email since they don't have a phone number (sketchy already). They called me off a blocked number, promised me a refund (this is on August 8th). It's August 30th & they have yet to refund me TWO refunds now. Telling me it was processed so talk to my bank cuz it's not their fault. DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY!!!!!!! SCAMMERS!

Title: I've always had great customer service from ASOS.
Review: Every time I've ordered from ASOS, I've always received my items quickly and with no hassle. On the one instance that I returned an item, I received an instant refund and they paid return postage costs. I didn't need to chase up for a refund. That's why I will continue to be a customer.

Title: sent me exact same faulty shoes twice!!!!
Review: I have been using Asos for the past 2 years, and have found their customer service to be poor whenever ivd had a problem with my order. My most recent experience is the worst I've ever encountered though! I ordered an expensive pair of shoes, they arrived on time but had 2 nails sticking up through the inside. I sent them back and requested an exchange, clearly writing what the fault was. It always takes a long time to get a new product sent out, but this time it was taking longer than normal and I had to send a chaser email. Funnily enough, after they emailed back the shoes were despatched. They gave an excuse that they had been busy. I noticed then that they had despatched to my home address despite my original order going to my parents. I emailed to explain I wouldn't be in and it was an issue. I ordered a new pair to my parents address and asked they cancel the other order. The replacement pair actually turned up on the Sunday but they had a large black stain on. I sent them back, and awaited the second order. When it arrived, I was disgusted to find they'd send me back out the pair with nails in again. I was furious. I have been in contact with them on Twitter and found them to be unprofessional and unhelpful. I've asked for it to be escalated as I'm not happy waiting 7 days for 2 refunds. They said they would pass to escalation team, and I've had to chase them twice about that already! I'm never using them again, they are a complete cowboy company!

Title: Do not order international delivery.
Review: Customer service replies really fast; however, only to let you know that even you paid for an express delivery, the package will take longer than a "saver" delivery.Don't waste money on this website, they are jokers. Better knit it yourself.  PS. 15 days after order still not shipped (initial estimated delivery time: 3 working days).

Title: DO NOT BUY
Review: I will strongly advice against this webshop. Have now tried for more than two months to get in contact with them in order to return items. They went completely radio silence and now I am stucked with 4 items (+500 EUR) I cannot use.  Worst EVER webshop experience - STAY AWAY

Title: Awful Customer Service
Review: I ordered a suit for an upcoming trip that was scheduled to be delivered, according to ASOS, a few days prior to my trip.  When the package didn't arrive as promised, the customer service member responded with a too-bad-it'll-get-there-eventually attitude that I didn't appreciate.  At the end of the day, I understand that a company doesn't control how fast a package arrives once it is in transit, but they can be proactive before shipping to make sure that they choose a shipping option that ensures arrival by the promised date and if there are issues, they can issue an apology and a resolution.

Title: Simular
Review: I ordered three dresses from the brand ASOS.One dress was from asospetite and fitted me well (UK8), but a size smaller was maybe better. The other two dresses were the same but another color. I ordered UK8 and they were both to big. The red one was even bigger than the white one, even if I ordered the same sizes. The products were delivered the day after I ordered it.I'm 168cm and 49kg.

Title: Beyond a joke.
Review: I bought two items from them on the 16th of August and everything went smooth until Hermes claimed to have delivered my items on the 18th when they hadn't. I contacted ASOS to tell them that my parcel's tracking claimed that it was delivered to my porch when it hadn't despite two people being in the property at the time. I contact ASOS who said they would send out a replacement ASAP as both items were in stock. Three days later and there is no dispatch e-mail from the second order.  Queried this with their Customer Care Team on Twitter who tell me it won't be sent out until the 25th of August despite both items being in stock.  I asked ASOS to cancel this order and refund me. They told me they will request an order cancellation from the warehouse and will let me know.  6 hours later I received a dispatch e-mail.  I ask them why I received this and they told me that it can be a tight turn around and sometimes parcels are already picked before cancellation comes through. Fair enough, I thought, I will send back once I receive the items.  So I receive the items today... or item.  They had only sent me one item instead of two.  I ended up tweeting them again asking for details of their complaint procedure (still haven't received it). Ended up calling them on a number that they don't seem to advertise on their website but can find if googled. Explained the situation to Ricardo, who was very helpful and figured out what happened.  I will never use ASOS again.  I have placed 4 orders in the last 3 months and they've managed to screw up 3 out of 4. This one in particular was beyond a joke. I want to be able to buy from a retailer hassle free.  I would rather pay full price for a reliable retailer than ASOS.

Title: 4 stars
Review: Free delivery, fast service, good package... The pictures are more glamorous that the real clothes.

Title: Love shopping, love ASOS!
Review: Great site! Love it ... but I love shopping too! LOL Probably why I'm single ... spend all my time in the shops hehe x Thanks ASOS! Any chance of a voucher discount???

Title: refund process stinks
Review: i have been buying from asos for years and am a premier customer. in july i made a major purchase that came in 2 packages which i returned in july in 2 packages. i have been refunded for 1 package and i have been trying to get the refund for the other package for 7 weeks now.they keep telling me its been refunded and to wait 10 days then nothing. ..now they want bank statements..i have noticed other reviews with similar experiences.asos really bad customer service. .stop putting the onus on the customer. ..this is your problem. .you should fix it

Title: Wrong items
Review: Super upset with asos. They sent me completely wrong items and would not honor any discount for me to repurchase the same items. They said because it's sale items they can not give me any special discount. So not only do I have to waste my time (pregnant with a toddler) at the post office, I have to wait another week and a half to hopefully receive the correct items. I'm not sure if I want to purchase from this company anymore.

Title: pretty good
Review: Great range for tall women. The only issues are with delivery.

Title: Asos curve
Review: I have brought my clothes from there for years  .i thought I had better tell you what excellent clothing it is.there customer service is excellent  only one small problem there are no phones it's all done through email but that's answered rather rapid.but the service you get from them is excellent they deserve  more than 5 stars.if you have to send anything back at all there returns is excellent too. I'm very pleased with them so I hope you will be too and very up to date clothing.

Title: 4 Weeks For A Refund!
Review: I am an ASOS premier customer and had ordered at the end of july, tried my things on to find they did not fir and sent them back using their prepaid sticker via Royal Mail. I had to prompt them that I hadn't received a confirmation of return after 8 working days (their policy states up to 7 working days) and so I sent them my proof of postage receipt.They said they would refund, but they hadn't actually received the goods back yet and to wait up to 5 working days for money to show in my account.Another week passed and still no sign of my money. Emailed again and they said there had been a "glitch" in their system and would retry the refund and to wait ANOTHER 5 working days.9 working days later i emailed AGAIN as the money had still not been refunded and they asked to see my bank statement to prove that the money had been taken out and not been put back in by them!!I have now been assured that the money has been refunded again and been told it may take up to 10 working days!!!This will be nearly 5 weeks of a no showing refund, please beware.Very polite staff though this doesn't resolve the issue.

Title: Faulty and wrong picks
Review: My first order from ASOS I found shoved through my letter box which my dog unfortunatly got a hold of and was useless, taking note of that I re ordered and left a note not to put through letter box but all of the items received where faulty! I thought it was just bad luck so 3rd times the charm i ordered and all the items i got where the wrong sizes! After these experiences I now just see them an as online Primark!

Title: Treated me like a liar
Review: I ordered a present for my brother from ASOS which was never delivered.The courier (DPD) claimed to have a signature but, as I told ASOS, there was no one at the property at the time the signature was recorded, which I could provide evidence to support. After 2 full investigation and more than a month of battling they still refused to refund or replace the products!

Title: good customer service
Review: i have bought a fair bit from ASOS over the years, recently i ordered a package which according to Aust Post was delivered , however i was at home when "delivery" supposedly occurred. So i contacted them and they told me they'd send a replacement free of charge, so i'm more than happy to keep buying from them.

Title: Delivery Service w/ Hermes
Review: I ordered a Barney's Originals Double Zip Biker Jacket in Bonded PU last week and it said estimate delivery would be 20th August 2015. However it arrived today the Hermes delivery guy was frustrated for waiting around for even one minute and left my item on the door which any passer-by can just take and it is my money down the drain. I am only writing my complaint on here as I could not find anything for hermes customer service.

Title: Great Customer service
Review: I ordered a suit and a pair of dress shoes from asos and they upgraded the delivery to International Express delivery. I received the order promptly within 3 working days. The shoes and the suit was great, I miscalculated the size of the suit so I ordered another one and sent this one back. I had no hassles, my new order again got an upgraded delivery. The order that I had sent back was received within a week's time and was refunded the same day. The new suit was great. The color of both the suits were accurate as displayed on the picture (not on the video). I will def use them again. Great customer service.

Title: Great selection
Review: Great selection, but some delivery costs are way to expansive and sometimes they don't even deliver it on time sooo...

Title: terrible quality
Review: bought a pair of shoes.. split apart from the tip in just 15 days. item returned and got refunded but not delivery charges. 4 quid out of pocket. will never buy from asos..

Title: Order sent to wrong address
Review: My order was sent to wrong address.Even though the courier said the package could be re-directed, Asos tried to make me believe that this wasn't possible.After 10 days emailing back and forth I gave up. Every time I get an answer it was always from a new customer service employee who hadn't read previous emails, and therefore it was from scratch every time.So in the end I have to spend 10£ and 3 hours of transport to pick up my parcel. So much for "free shipping" :)

Title: Love it!
Review: I really don't get why this site got so many bad reviews. I never had a single problema with asos. Their clothes are amazing and the delivery is fast. I love it!

Title: Horrible Customer service
Review: ASOS customer service is beyond horrible.  I recently purchased some school clothes from ASOS. I had recently moved so when I got to check out I updated my address. The next day I checked status on my package and saw that it was being shipped to my old address, I was very annoyed. I contacted ASOS by email because they don't have a call center and expressed my issue to them. Someone named Phil got back to me that same day and said that he would look into my issue and he asked me for my Order # and my address. The next day in the afternoon I noticed that Phil or anyone from ASOS customer service had still not contacted me back about the whereabouts of my package so I sent them a few emails back to back expressing my annoyance with this whole isse. Later on that day someone from there customer service name Sophie emailed back and said:Hello Yanni, Thanks for getting back in touch about the address change of your order ######## We're unable to amend the delivery address your order is being sent to. The parcel has been delivered to:#################################### This was delivered on the 11th August at 13:55 to the concierge.  You can try to retrieve the parcel from the current delivery address or ask the person at the address to return it to ASOS. If it's returned to us, a refund will then be issued and you'll receive an email to let you know. If you still want the items and they're still available, please order them through our website as normal as I'm unable to place your order for you, for security reasons. An easy way to do this is to log into your account, view the original order and then add the items you want back into your shopping bag. I'm sorry that this probably wasn't the answer that you was hoping for Yanni. If there's anything else tat you need,please get back in touch I'll be happy to help. Best wishes, SophieI was frustrated because basically they where like I had to pay even more money to get my package on a error they made or put my trust in some strangers hands hoping that they will do the right thing and send my package back I could not believe it. I then responded and asked to speak with a manager but I got no reply back they totally stop responding to my emails.

Title: Fantastic
Review: Great delivery time - delivered on both Saturday & Sunday (one of the items i wanted came back in stock the day after I had originally ordered). Customer service was brilliant through email, replied almost straight away. Thanks.

Title: Absolutely crappy customer service
Review: I'm a student who has made regular purchases for many years and have had a problem once where my order was not picked right and returned it TWICE to finally have it picked right and bearing in mind it was my prom dress so I was not happy about it not arriving on time. Yesterday, i've tried purchasing an order with my regular student discount code which both Asos and UNiDAYS provide and have used in the past but somehow it didn't work so I contacted both websites. Asos, low and behold, was RUBBISH at solving my query. They TOTALLY did NOT read my email properly and suggested I contact NUS out of all people to sort this out! They simply linked me to the NUS homepage, NOT help/ support page, and left me to my own devices. That was such an unexpectedly stupid thing for a big company such as Asos to do in terms of customer service to not even read my email properly! Will NOT be shopping at Asos anytime soon.

Title: Horrible site
Review: most difficult site ever to try place a order!. Would not bother ordering again.

Title: I love ASOS
Review: NIce range of clothes. Many different brands and they sell clothes from other high street retailers. Fast delivery. I have been using ASOS for years and cant fault them.

Title: Great
Review: I really don't get why this site got so many bad reviews.. I never had trouble with asos. It's easy and a lot of the stuff is cheap too... So yeah, I love it!

Title: Worst CS team I've ever come across
Review: I love the variety Asos has. Especially for petites, which in other places is just hard to shop for. It really is a shame that their packing/shipping department and customer service teams are very inattentive. I was sent the wrong item after having it shipped express to have it on time for the weekend. I ordered a size 2 mini dress, and they sent me a size 6 long gown. Do they even read labels or check the item description before packing them?! Long story short, I didn't get to wear what I had planned to for a weekend event, and ended in a huge disappointment. Getting back to the customer service team, I know they couldn't careless if you were shipped the wrong item, or if it arrived late. Because it probably happens all the time! When I emailed service about getting the wrong item, they responded with an email completely irrelevant to my issue, which caused even more frustration. This tells me they don't actually read it. Asos really needs a one day or overnight shipping option for emergencies like these. If they did there would have been hopes to solving my problem. Asos, I love your product variety. But what's the point if your packing/shipping department and customer service teams are total disasters? Totally unhelpful.

Title: Lovely
Review: loved everything I purchased recently!

Title: Pictures don't match the products
Review: I made two orders from Asos.co.uk and both times the product did not match the picture posted on the website. One was a lipstick, which they would not accept a return for because "it had been opened", even though the colour was clearly different from the picture ("we will advise our marketing team"), the second was a white lace dress which was entirely white on the website but turned out to have a brown front panel on the actual product! That was returned and refunded but was also the last time I will order from Asos.

Title: delivery
Review: I was meant to have an item delivered on a specific day chosen and paid extra for this. the couriers used as they used hermes and dpd both don't have my item and this was for a specific even which is why a selected date was chose for delivery.   however I called asos and the person I spoke to was extremely helpful. They informed me they would check and if the parcel could not be found they would refund the rest of my money as they will already refund my delivery and there is no more in my size. very happy with the service just a shame about the courier. I work I  a distribution centre and we use dpd and know what it can be like.

Title: Next day delivery...never delivered!
Review: Ordered from ASOS and was eligible for next day delivery. Due to the useless couriers Asos use, they kept trying to deliver a package during non-business hours to a busiess address even though i contacted Asos customer services twice to confirm it was a business address who assured me they would deliver during business hours the next day. Lo and behold, i sitll hadn't received the package today so followed up again to be told it was getting redelivered to their warehouse as they "could not deliver it" (note my work recception takes deliveries anytime of day between business hours - in fact an order from another retailer which I had ordered the same day as this Asos order had already been delivered successfully today). Asos said they would not be able to deliver my package (ever) so will have to refund me...but the great news is, is that i can re-order the same items IF the items are in stock! Thanks Asos...so kind. Not ordering from them again, not worth the frustration.

Title: Great service
Review: Orders are always on time. I live in the Netherlands and receive my orders always within three days. Great customer service. I bought heeled sandals and after 10 minutes of wearing both the heels clipped off. Being unable to walk I stumbled to a shoemaker across the street who fixed them. Sent Asos an email about a possible reimbursement and got a reply within an hour that they will reimburse the costs of the shoemaker. Only downside is the shipping by DHL, if I miss two delivery attempts I have to go to a DHL pick up point which is really far away!

Title: Would recommend
Review: My go to website for all men's fashion items, a great range to choose from and easy to use website

Title: Never had a problem with an order
Review: I have been shopping with ASOS for a few years now and I've never had a problem with an order. If they are not early, they are always on time. Free returns and free (international) delivery when spent £20 or more makes it even more attractive. However, I recently faced a problem with an ASOS Rewards codes after accumulating more than 500 points. Unfortunately, it took them almost two months and countless emails from me to sort it out. Overall, good company.

Title: Great service.
Review: Order delivered collect plus within 48 hours.Item of clothing didn't fit, got refund within 5 days. And a replacement item within 7 days. Couldn't complain one bit about the service. Free returns is great as well.

Title: Can't understand these bad reviews.
Review: Never had any problem with Asos at all, myself and girlfriend use them all the time and the delivery is always on time and the returns are dealt with quickly and efficiently. What more could you want?

Title: bad quality :(
Review: on the picture seems like perfect but in the real its a bad quality :/ , i just wany to know where can i find the one on the picture i do like it in the picture , how ever it will be my last purchase in ASOS :/ , and its not cheap ://

Title: Very good
Review: great service, delivery and products!!

Title: COVERED UP SWIM SUITS
Review: Been looking for modest/covered up swimsuits everywhere! ASOS had so many to choose from and I bought two longsleeved suits and one dress one! I am a size 14/16 and even though it's swimwear it is not inappropriate or too tights, it fits perfectly and I feel so comfortable in them all! I didn't send any back!!! If anyone is looking to be covered up when they are away this summer, check out ASOS, you will not be dissapointed! Also very fast shipment!

Title: Love it!
Review: I was really really surprised when I logged on here and saw so many negative reviews! I love ASOS and use it very regularly. I find that the quality of their goods, sizes and prices are all really great! I've been using ASOS for the last 3 years and have ordered a large number of items spanning over various categories and have never been disappointed. I'm really sorry to hear that that hasn't been the experience for everyone....it's a real shame.

Title: The worst costumer service I have experienced
Review: I bought a bathing suit and a skirt and payed for express delivery witch should be dispatched within 24 hours. After 5 days the order is still not dispatched and I want to cancel it since it is now irrelevant because I have left for three weeks on vacation. This is not possible and they dispatch it after 6 days though I have told them several times to cancel the order. Now I am home again and I have to pay the return myself though the fault is on asos.  Simply NEVER buying anything here again. They are just cheating costumers to get money.

Title: Not sure why there even is a CS team
Review: I made a simple order online (only one dress) and was highly anticipating its arrival. Upon opening the package, not only was I sent the wrong size, wrong color, etc, I was sent the completely wrong item.  Of course, I submitted a form online immediately and followed the instructions for return. Days and weeks past. I sent follow up emails to ask about my order. When I finally receive a response, the item I initially ordered was out of stock. Of course it was. It's been 3 weeks since!  The CS team gave me answers from the FAQ page. They offered ZERO solutions. I am also incredibly confused by the logistics team did not immediately pull the correct item off the shelf and ship it right away while it was still in stock.  As I am asking for a full refund, a CS team member has the AUDACITY to tell me that they will only refund the amount of the dress, and not cover shipping. Why would I pay ANY money for your mistake?  Again, no apologies or solutions were offered to me. The CS team at ASOS is a complete joke, and offering a FULL refund is the very least they can do.    With all the delay in communication and all the time wasted with ASOS, I will not be shopping with them again.

Title: Petite
Review: I'm 5 foot and always struggle to find nice jeans, a friend recomended asos and i noticed that while they have a large petite range of trousers all the models are 5"6 or taller. This information is in the product details. This puts me off buying anything from their petite range as none of the models showing the items are what i would call petite.such a shame asos get some shorter models please :( Jess King.

Title: Asos Customer service
Review: Honestly, I buy most of my trainers from ASOS because of their great customer service. They deliver on time or even early most of time. They RARELY make mistakes, and I love their sales. sneakerface.net

Title: Asos saved the day :)
Review: So I had ordered a chi chi london dress from the chi chi website for a wedding I was attending.  The dress came the day before the wedding and they had sent me the wrong size!!! :( I was devastated and started to seriously panic. Thank goodness I turned to Asos and they really did save the day. I was able to order the exact same dress for next day delivery.   I placed my order at 6.27pm on Friday and Asos delivered my dress at 9.07am on Saturday! :D  Amazing. I can't rate Asos highly enough, fantastic company.

Title: Great service!
Review: Great service! Delivery on time and you can even follow your parcel minute after minute!!Great customer service!Would highly recommend!

Title: LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT!!!
Review: I have NEVER experienced a disappointment with asos, is actually a very good online store, and I love they have this small videos of models modeling the clothes before you buy it. I just love the website! FAVORITE ONLINE STORE *****

Title: Completely Happy With My Order!
Review: I have recently received a pair of white leather PUMA sneakers that I ordered to wear with my scrubs in the OR. Ordering online was fast and easy, and I got an email confirming my order. I was surprised that the order arrived in a timely fashion because I chose standard shipping. When I received my order, I was impressed. The sneakers were finely made, with real leather; very sturdy and comfortable. I am totally satisfied and will definitely shop at ASOS again! Keep up the great work!

Title: Their customer care is a complete joke!
Review: I orders am item on Monday with next day delivery and received both email and text communication from ASOS confirming it would be delivered on Tuesday. The DPD tracker said it never arrived with them and I emailed ASOS customer care on Wednesday afternoon to alert them to this.  Their first reply on Thursday morning just said the tracker says it isn't with DPD (funny I told you that). I replied later to ask if they had any further information and I got a reply from a different customer care assistant saying he would look into it - if I gave him 24hrs - my order was already 48hrs late by this stage. Confusingly I received a second email that evening that was a follow up to their original email (and completely ignored any email  I or indeed ASOS had sent since) saying it had been lost and a replacement would be sent. Fine! If only the story ended there - on Friday I got another email informing me it was lost and a replacement would be sent. Both emails that talked about a replacement said I would receive a dispatch email. Whilst waiting for this email, I received an entirely different one - informing me that my returned parcel had been received and a refund issued. Funny I didn't receive any parcel so would have been unable to return it! It seems that their customer care is a farce, I had emails from four different people who clearly had not looked at any other communication relating to this order. My final communication - four days after reporting non-delivery was to say we have refunded your money. A complete shambles - I wanted the replacement shipment not a refund but because multiple incompetencies by their so called 'customer care' team this option was removed from me. Add to this the fact that I had to find a phone number for them online as they don't have one on their website they only offer the multiple person, we will tell you anything and not follow it up email system.

Title: You had one job
Review: The only time I ordered something from Asos was a gift certificate for my best friend which basically required them minimum efforts from your side - send a picture with a promocode to an e-mail address on a particular day. On my friend's birthday I didn't congratulate her on purpose hoping that Asos will deliver my certificate and wishes on time..by the end of the day I felt something was wrong and wrote a friend whether she received it or not - she didn't of course. I wrote to Asos' customer support and they apologized, however needed two more reminders to send the certificate out IN 2 DAYS! Hopefully my friend understood the situation and was happy with a present. But Asos crashed my plans. You had one job, Asos. I paid basically for air - for a JPG picture to be sent to an email, but you are unable to deliver even this much for my own money. What can I say - my next friend will receive a certificate from another, more reliable shop. And I sincerely recommend anyone who doesn't want to endanger their plans / friendships to order gifts somewhere else.

Title: I want so badly for this to be a five star review
Review: I have ordered from Asos five times, so I consider myself to be knowledgeable enough to make this a sturdy review. I have to say, with five orders and one return I've never had any problems whatsoever with Asos customer service or shipping: all of my packages arrived exactly on time with no bumps in the road (and I live in the US, not the UK). So I'll make this simple:PROS:- Seriously unique styles available. ASOS really does carry styles I've never seen anywhere else, which is why they bring me back even after bad experiences. - Awesome prices, with a huge sale inventory. - Their website, shipping, and entire ordering process is really easy to navigate. They also send both receipt and shipping email alerts (which I appreciate). - When it's good, it's great! The clothes I've gotten from ASOS that have fit and were decent quality have uniformly been pieces I LOVE. - Returns are not only FREE, but also very seamless and forgiving. I have been known to keep stuff I was unhappy with merely to avoid the hassle of returning it, but ASOS really is good about refunding you and making it quick. CONS:- SIZING. This is my #1 complaint, and my reason for writing this review. I recently paid for an order that included two pairs of shoes and two pairs of shorts, with all the items being ASOS brand. The shoes, both of which I sized up in (I am a 9.5, often a 9, and I ordered 10's to be safe!) were too small. This was crazy, because I've never needed a size bigger than a 10 in my life. The shorts, which I ordered in my normal size, were WAY too big. In order of the clothes I have gotten, here has been my sizing experiences: dress (non-ASOS brand) – WAY too big, swimsuit bottoms (non-ASOS brand) – perfect, flat shoes (ASOS, and I should note these also were a size 10!) – perfect, crop top (ASOS) – perfect, shorts (non-ASOS) – WAY too big, which brings us to the order I already described above. I feel like I'm playing Russian Roulette with this company, even as I order everything in my regular sizes! Lord knows if I sized down to auto-correct, it would be just my luck that item would run small. I really think this could be remedied if the website had reviews, and it worries me that they don't.– As said above, there are no product reviews. What are they hiding?!– While ASOS brand stuff is reasonable quality for the price, the same does not go for all the brands they carry. Once, I was so profoundly disappointed by a Vero Moda dress I ordered that I nearly never bought from the website again. Of course, if you're familiar with a brand they carry and know how it fits you/the quality, etc, then go for it.– It really sucks when they carry styles exclusive to one of their petite, tall, or plus-sized brands that are not available for straight sizes! Often there's like a pair of petite brand shorts that I fall in love with, and ultimately have to ignore cause 5"4 does not qualify as petite :( In conclusion: I am ALWAYS hesitant about online shopping, and picky at that. ASOS keeps bringing me back because I'm so in love with the styles they carry and their service makes it all very easy. But they really need to get their sizing under control, or I'll have to force myself to stop shopping here because it is just disappointing. I really think they are capable of better.

Title: Non-delivery due to DHL postal (lack of) service
Review: UPDATE:I received a quick response from Asos to my complaint / cancellation of my order and apologies. Saying I will get a refund within 21 days and they wil look into the DHL post service matter.I've changed my review to a more positive one for Asos, but I'll wait with buying something again at Asos until they can offer some alternative delivery. - - -I've sent several emails to Asos and their postal service DHL about my doorbell not working and asking to change the delivery address. At the DHL site I found the option to have the package delivered to a parcel shop nearby. I filled it out and got confirmation.After that I did not hear anything for a while. I sent another email to DHL and they replied that something went wrong and the package was not delivered at the Parcel Shop. They also said that there would be another delivery attempt that day. Well, I'd say, after all the attempts I've made to communicate with both companies, just to deliver a simple pair of slippers... I find both their services sadly disappointing and inadequate. Just read the email correspondence and decide for yourself... For now, I will spend some more wasted hours on figuring out how to get my money back :( (15th juli, 2015 - Asos reply)Hello C.X., Thanks so much for getting in touch about your recent order 160816036 - So sorry that you haven't received your parcel yet. I've checked your order for you and can see that the carrier attempted to deliver your parcel onthe 4th July, 7th July and the 8th July but sadly no one was present to receive the order. As this is the case, your parcel was returned back to the warehouse on the 8th July. Parcels can be returned to us because the carrier has not been able to locate the address, has left a calling card and has not received a response or due to the parcel being refused at the delivery address. Please allow up to 21 working days from the date your parcel was sent back to us for it to arrive in our warehouse. As soon as it does, we'll get it sorted within 1 working day and send you an email to let you know. I'm really sorry your order didn't reach you. If you still want the items and they're still available, please order them through our website as normal as I'm unable to place your order for you, for security reasons. An easy way to do this is to log into your account, view the original order and then add the items you want back into your shopping bag. I hope this helps, if you have any further questions please let me know - I'm happy to help. Best wishes,JennyASOS Customer Care - - -(15th juli, 2015)Hi Saiful Ehshan, After several emails with your DHL post service, I still haven't received my package?Usually I get a card with information in my letterbox from the DHL, but there's nothing. It's been two weeks since the order has been dispatched.If I don't get any response from DHL or Asos within 14 days, I would like to receive my money back from my order - number 160816036.I'm dissatisfied with the DHL service and I hope you will start an inquiry in their services. It's not the first time this happens with DHL and I had hoped the 'Parcel shop' system would improve their services. Maybe it would be a solution if Asos provides an (alternative) option for delivery at a Parcel Shop or other Post office address in the order form? Below you can find the translated email correspondence with DHL post service. With kind regards,C.X. Gottenkieny - - - (9th juli, 2015) Dear Tina, Thank You for your message. The reason that i have made the change to the instructions for package delivery in the parcel shop is, because my doorbell does not work at this time.Could the DHL postal service contact me via mobile xx xxxxxxxx ? And if this is not possible, otherwise delivery via the parcel shop as instructed? Thank you in advance! With kind regards,Xenia - - -(8th juli, 2015 - Asos reply) Best mrs Gottenkieny, Thank You for your message. Unfortunately, something has gone wrong so that your change in the delivery instruction is not properly performed.The package has not been delivered in the parcelshop . According to our information, your package will be offered today once again on your address between 18.00h and 21.00h. We apologize for the inconvenience. With kind regards, TinaDHL Parcel Customer Service

Title: Terrible
Review: Did not receive my item and when I contacted them about it they gave me  a rude response as if it was my fault it got "lost" in the mail. I had to pay an extra duty fee when they sent out the replacement item. By the time i got it, it was too late. Also when returning, its not even prepaid. So i've spent more money on useless fees when I wont even wear the item. The worst experience from a company by far.

Title: Asos is #1
Review: I am very surprised by all of the bad reviews that are placed on this website about Asos. I Have truly not experienced anything bad with Asos, I have always received my items on time, and I order for me and my husband, and If  we ever had an issue customer service always replied in an instant. So I have luckily not experienced anything bad yet! I think Asos is the best clothing site out there it has everything you need with a wide price range. Therefore 5 stars! :)

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Have placed my first order and wish I'd realised how many people seem to have problems with lost deliveries and impossible to contact customer service. No parcel turned up (fine, these things happen and are to be expected if Hermes is the courier used). Tried emailing, twitter - no response. All I want is to get a refund for goods not received. Appalling non-existent customer service.

Title: Good seller!
Review: Now 1 st time order from Asos,good price,FREE speedy delivery!I will recommended this shop!

Title: Poor customer service
Review: I had a problem with my order and contacted ASOS 4 days ago and have still not heard back. Meanwhile, ASOS continue to update their social media with endless irrelevant videos and jokes, rubbing salt into the wounds of unhappy customers. Used to love ASOS, but now they got so big they don't care about the customer anymore. Will not use again.

Title: Nice store
Review: I bought a printing dress for wife ， it is beautiful and comfortable，my wife and her friends all like it.

Title: worst customer service ever!
Review: I recently ordered a belt off asos for an upcoming wedding, when the item arrived I opened it to find a completely different belt to the one I ordered, I contacted asos via facebook (as this is the only way to get some what of a quick response) and attached some pictures showing the item I ordered and what I actually received hoping to get some sort of a solution off them. The response is received was disgusting, a very sarcastic message detailing how the images were like a spot the difference game for a three year old, they did how ever say they would post out the item again. When the second item arrived it was again incorrect I can only assume this is down to an error on their behalf with the images they are using on their site, I once again contacted them via facebook with the only response being to send my items back for a refund. this exchange has left me rather angry as not once did they apologise for the rude response I received or did they offer a good will gesture for sending an incorrect item twice.

Title: Best site for online shopping
Review: My favourite website. Has clothes for all shapes and sizes. There is so much choice. You can end up browsing for hours. Sells clothes from asos and many other brands. Delivery is always on time or comes just before you expect. No problems with this site so far....touch wood. I'm sure it's the UK no1 site for young adults. Love it

Title: ASOS is my go to online store!!!
Review: Just recieved 5 items from ASOS: a jacket, a sweater, 2 tee shirts and a backpack. All of them fit my size tremendously!!! The shipping was very quick to Canada and I appreciate everything! And I will be ordering more and more to come :)

Title: Easy and convenient
Review: I placed quite a large order with Asos and once my order was processed I then decided to read some of the reviews, which obviously left me a little worried! However, I found the service I received was very easy and a smooth process. My order was dispatched as a next day delivery, in which I also got a text with a one hour window as to when my parcel will arrive which is incredibly handy! AND it actually was delivered within that hour!  I do have some bits I need to send back however it seems as though the process is just as simple. Couldn't be happier with my experience!

Title: Professionally unethical behaviour
Review: I have been dealing with Asos for quite a while now, until recently I ordered a next day delivery.Well needless to say as I write this review I am still waiting and it was supposed to be delivered on July 04.I became very frustrated trying to contact them on line with no success, even the email which came to me saying that the order was confirmed, when I used it, came back as an unattended box.I then  tried calling only to discover that the call cost 75p per minute.Luckily I then discovered a 0207 number.I lost my cool. To think that they have a 0207 number and is  forcing customers to call a number charging 75p a minute is unethical and a disgrace to the people  who buy  from them.I am rethinking my relationship with ASOS because this is wrong on every level.BY THE WAY, THE NUMBER IS  0207 756 6100

Title: all (ok, some) style - no substance
Review: Terrible, terrible customer service - some of the worst I've ever experienced from any company.  ASOS say that UK Mail lost my parcel, but they refuse to send a replacement order, and they are obviously stringing me along by continuing to insist that they are trying to obtain more information about what happened to my order. (It's been nearly two weeks now.) I get perky and repetitious emails from the company whenever I contact them, but absolutely no satisfaction. I have finally resorted to asking my credit card company for a refund - hate doing that, as none of this is their fault!  I will NEVER order from ASOS again.

Title: Excellent
Review: Hands down the best online retailer, ordered a fair few items and not a single problem, sent one item back as was too big but they text you when they have received it and again when the exchange has been dispatched... My only moan would be they should really have a few stores but no biggy.

Title: Bad experience
Review: Received worn item without tags and loads of stains! It is unbelievalbe that returned items are not checked, and again they are being posted to other customers!

Title: First Order, Not Bad At All
Review: I ordered the Club L Plus Plunge Jersey Pencil Dress in pink product code 688880 (From the curve plus size women's section). I ordered the dress very late Tuesday evening June 6th and paid for 2 day shipping. I received notification via email the order would arrive on or before Thursday June 9th. I received the order Wednesday June 8th before noon. My order was literately processed and shipped in one day. I was nervous I needed the dress for a wedding I was attending that up coming Saturday July 11th while tracking the shipping I noticed it shipped from the UK so I was a little nervous. However the efficiency of the order processing shipping was not an issue. I opened the package pleasantly delighted to find the dress was exactly as advertised on the website. The dress was true to color. The material is of good quality.  I would have giving 5 stars however there were minor issues. Viewing the dress online on the model it was clear the dress would require alterations. Since most items I purchase require alterations that was a non issue for me. This is my first purchase from ASOS I wasn't sure if the sizes run true or if I could trust the size chart. I am 5'5 220 pounds. I have an hour glass figure.I have a bit of tummy overage, and about an inch of upper back fat. My measurements are 44-39-47 I wear a true size 16. I ordered a size 18. I received a size 22. I don't know if the incorrect size was an error or if ASOS was familiar with the product. Thank goodness I received the 22. The dress fits extremely close to the body. It literally hugs the body like a glove. But it feels good on. It is very important wear the proper undergarments and body shaper with this particular dress because it will reveal every secret you have. So in the case of this dress a size 16 or 18 would have been to small. The sleeves of the dress gathered a bit to much for me and they were to long (which could be seen on the model as well) so they had to be altered to tapper my arms better. However I like the extra space because my arms are a bit large.  All in all I am very pleased with the dress and the processing of my order. I apologize if I gave to much personal information but I look for detailed descriptions when reading a review.

Title: Cheap and cheerful.
Review: Others may have had problems with ASOS, but...I've bought over 20 items of clothing (trousers, waistcoats, tracksuits) from  ASOS and never had a problem. From my experience, ASOS products are great value for money. The next-day-delivery service, "premier", is cheap (£9.95 for a year, compared to Amazon Prime at £79). Service for me has always been great. Returns and exchanges have been seamless. Honestly, I can't fault them.

Title: Best online clothes shop
Review: I have been an asos customer for a while now but i decided to take up the 9.95 offer for 1year premier membership, its the best thing indid, next day delivery on every order, nominated delivery if need to aswell, bargain, the clothes are always good quality, never recieved bad quality, i will use Asos for my clothes shopping for many years to come :-)

Title: Aldrig haft et problem (Never had a problem)
Review: Jeg har været kunde hos asos i ca. 3 år, og køber stort set alt mit tøj fra asos. Vil tro jeg kun har købt tøj fra andre steder end asos 4-6 gange de sidste 2 år, og jeg køber tøj ca. 3 gange om måneden.  Man får hvad man ser, og min ordre er aldrig kommet senere, end den seneste frist de angiver i ordresbekræftelsen. Udover det er det jo alt for lækkert, at der er gratis forsendelse. Måske er jeg bare virkelig heldig, men fra andre jeg kender, der også shopper på asos, har der heller aldrig været nogen problemer. Jeg har en enkelt gang skulle returnere en kjole, og der var heller ingen problemer. Jeg har aldrig skulle skrive ind til deres kunde service, så på det plan har jeg desværre ingen ekspertise. ELSKER ASOS <3 (English translation)I've been a customer at asos for approx. 3 years now and get most of my clothes from their site. I believe I've only bought clothes 4-6 times from other webshops/stores than asos within the past 2 years. - I buy clothes approx. 3 times pr. month.  You receive what you expect, and I've never experienced receiving an order later than the date that has been informed in the order confirmation. Besides that, it's just a luxury that they provide free international delivery (Excuse me if this doesn't include all countries, I havn't read their international shipping policy). Maybe I'm just really lucky with my service, but friends and acquaintances of mine, who also shops at asos, hasn't had any difficulties either. I had to return a dress to asos once and once again I didn't have any difficulties. I have never had the need to write an email to their costumer service, so unfortunately I don't have any expertise in that area. LOVE ASOS <3

Title: Fast delivery, accessories for every taste!
Review: I ordered a Batiste Dry Shampoo, 3 Nail polishes and 1 lipstick. Fast delivery, no problem at all. I was able to track my order all the way, and there was no need to contact Asos at all, so I don't know how the service is. I like how there is free shipping, if you buy more than 125 DKK, which isn't a lot of money! I don't really like their clothes, but their accessories are on point. One for every taste. Their clothes are not for every taste though. Maybe too floral, printed, basic or just too simple to the price.  Delivered to Denmark and my package came within 3 work days.

Title: Outstanding and reliable!
Review: I've been using this website for a few years now to buy clothes. It is fantastic! If there are any missing orders (maybe 2 out of the 100 orders I've had with them) then their customer service will just mail you a replacement order. Definitely 5 stars for customer service!

Title: I'm Impressed
Review: I purchased a Trench Coat from Asos. (The delivery was very prompt considering it was free.)Looks great and fits perfectly. I think this is one of the best clothing sites online (even better in the sales)I sent the customer care team an email to let them know this. I received an email back-( same day). The email received back was very nice and thoughtful-which is great customer service. I've ordered a few things from Asos -no problems. Thumbs up  :)

Title: Never had a problem
Review: Asos have always been good to me, delivery times are exemplary, product always looks the same as on the pictures. great service.

Title: Impressed!
Review: Got my shirt after 8 days og waitining! (One day after promised...) Very good quality tho! Just ordered more d:

Title: Not impressed
Review: Ordered some shirts and paid for the premium service so I could get next day delivery. That was 4 days ago and still no sign.

Title: costumer service is very rude
Review: 1)They don't help or even offer advice, 2) their refund system is awful 5-10 working days really,the costumer service people all sound like robots, quoting the website with every questions.

Title: RUBBISH CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
Review: Ordered a dress but was out when it was delivered. Courier put a card through my door to say 2 parcels (other one was from Simply Be) had been left in my recycling box. This can't be seen from the street so clearly someone was following the courier around because when I got home 2 hours later there was nothing in the box. Contacted the 2 companies immediately. Simply Be responded and straight away and replaced the goods. Three weeks later I have not had a single response from ASOS other than an automated reply to say that they are looking into the problem and will get back to me! I won't be ordering from ASOS again!!

Title: Awful
Review: I received two faulty products, one ripped and one stained (which meant they had simply replaced a t-shirt that someone else had worn and gave it to me). I was fine exchanging the wripped one, but wished to keep the stained one because they had no more available and I really liked the top. All I wanted, which was completely reasonable and any other store would have instantly done, was a small discount on the price of the dirty t-shirt they sent me - they refused! They would only refund - which I already stated to them I would rather not do. They offer me a 15% discount on a future buy but because I already have student discount that was 10% and I can't use both codes together, this meant that it was only really a 5% discount which had an expiration date of merely 1 mounth, which I wouldn't use in such a short period of time because I already did my big summer shop. I asked them to increase the percatage by a little (after all I am always spending a lot of money there) - NO.I asked to at least extent the expiry date of the discount so I would actually be able to use it when I needed something - NO.So all in all, the only thing they offered me was something which would mean I spent more money at their store which benefited than way more than it did me. Why giving a small percentage off for a faulty product - which any else would do - is so hard, is beyond me.  If I can't trust them to be reasonable and be held to the same standard as other stores - why would I spend a good £400-£500 a year there?Rediculous and a shame because they have lost a very loyal customer!

Title: Never Again!
Review: Placed an order and got an email confirming that the order was received. Then got another email stating that the order has dispatched. Two days later yet another email, this time thanking me for returning the item. Obviously I never even received the package. Then when I contacted them they were very polite and said that they'll send me the item if it still is available. Now got an email saying that it's out of stock. The product is still for sale on their web page and can be ordered. Seems like a SCAM to me.

Title: Excellent
Review: Ordered handbags at 3pm Monday and i received it at 9am the following morning! Very impressed. Would definitely shop again!

Title: WORST online shopping experience ever!
Review: I ordered six items. Received email saying they had canceled my order and I needed to send passport and bank statements to verify payment for future orders. I did so but email bounced. In the meantime only two items I ordered were still available. Re-ordered but received same email saying to send passport and bank statements. A complete waste of time.

Title: wrong item, not in stock anymore
Review: Ordered from them for my first time and got lucky to order a shirt that was low in stock and that I was very excited to get my hands on.... And of course, they sent me the wrong item. And not only that, but it's not in stock anymore. The package had the right label on it but with the wrong shirt inside.  Perfect. Not shopping with them anymore.

Title: Not a problem thus far
Review: I've ordered a few times from ASOS, all spread throughout 2013-2015 and not had any major problems with my orders. My recent order was expected to come around Wednesday but arrived on the Saturday before hand (which if I had specified for a Saturday delivery I would have had to pay around £5) so if you're in the UK, you may as well go for Standard delivery and it may come much earlier like mine. I have noticed that some heels I bought had a blemish on them that I can't remove, but I can't be bothered with the hassle of returning so that doesn't seem much of an issue. Also, I wish they would not fold dresses when packing them as it gives them creases which is annoying if the dress is expensive. However, these issues are just me being critical and I think that the store itself is fine. Overall, the delivery was great, the clothing is usually in perfect condition and I'm left as a happy customer.

Title: ASOS- worst customer service I have ever experience
Review: I order some clothes online and got it sent to my UK address on screen the I saw the confirmed for my UK address  and said that i could expect deliver by June 18 but then an email came thought to me saying the clothes were being sent to a old Canadian address I use to live at and I could expect deliver by June 24th.....I don't live in Canada anymore or know who lives there and "the best they can do" is tell me to try and figure out who lives their and get them to return the package......how the hell was my UK credit card charged when they screwed up the delivery and billing address. I can't believe they didn't offer me a refund right away and apologise for their mistake I always enjoyed shopping at ASOS but I have never in my life received such horrible customer service. I am beyond frustrated with ASOS, I have emailed them through there website - absolutly useless...all the replies I got were template message and not personalise so I tried there Facebook page and started messaging them through that and each time it's a different agent who responses to my message and doesn't read the ones before them and just says sorry the deliver address can not be changed...if they can't change the delivery address they need to refund me for their mistake....I am outraged.  I would suggest everyone to save themselves this hassle and to never order from ASOS.

Title: ASOS is the best!
Review: I've been ordering from ASOS for atleast 7 years and have always thought their customer services department is amazing. Yes they do sometimes make mistakes, but they rectify them immediately and are extremely friendly and reply promptly by e-mail. 100% recommended by me (for UK only) and I trust them more than any other online site. I'm actually so shocked with the bad reviews as I've always had a positive experience.

Title: Used to be excellent - now abysmal.
Review: In the last 6 months every time I have ordered from ASOS I have had nothing but hassle.  Most recently I had problems trying to order during a 20% off promo and their customer service team kept asking me to use their website when I had told them their website was crashing repeatedly.  After 6 hours I managed to place my order but when I received it, it came in a box with no protection with a glass bottle of foundation rolling around inside.  Most recently I ordered again during another 20% off promo, I didn't learn the first time apparently, as I tried to pay it said the order failed, however checked paypal who said it had gone through.  I had no reply from Customer Service for two days and I had to chase them up repeatedly. Finally got an e-mail response who said it would take another 48 hours - may I add this was a birthday gift I had ordered on the 15th for the 23rd.  I found their phone number which they don't advertise on their site.  I spoke to a very pushy customer agent who confirmed my order had been cancelled and I would not be receiving it.  I told them it was a birthday gift, I needed it and they were holding my money.  She wouldn't budge, told me that the order was cancelled and that was it.  I asked if they would provide me with a discount code so I could reorder at the price I paid on Monday, she said no.  Not only are they holding my money, they aren't taking my order and they have left me now to go out and try and find another gift.  Not only that, I have to contact Paypal myself to sort out the money being held even though ASOS are the ones holding it!  An absolutely ludicrous way to treat customers. I had a previous discussion before where I stated I thought ASOS had become a shadow of their former self.  This has been very much confirmed and to be honest I will not be shopping with them again.  I can get most of their merchandise for other sites and shops and I wouldn't want to give them my money.

Title: Don't trust delivery times
Review: Great products but horrible US delivery. Their quoted delivery dates are not accurate! If you plan to order something expedited... Don't expect it to be delivered when you expect!  This has happened to me many times!

Title: I just love Asos!
Review: I just love everything about this shop! And it has one of the best delivery services!! I ordered a parcel at 9 pm via next day delivery and it was really delivered before 1 pm the next day! Thank you guys!!

Title: I loooove ASOS
Review: I have been ordering from Asos for over 4 years. I order at least 2-4 items a month, if not more. Their customer service has always been 5 star for me. My items are ALWAYS shipped in 2 days and the returns are ALWAYS hassle free.  My refunds are always credited back to my accounts. I'm a avid online shopper and Asos is in my top 5 for highest rated online customer service and quality of apparel.

Title: Still Waiting for my Item
Review: It has been such a bad experience and sill is as I m still waiting for my item to be deliver.For some reason my item was send to my billing address  when I did asked to be send to my work address, I receive the package at my home after receive a confirmation mail saying that it will be deliver to my work address.I did send it back as it was the wrong size, I then confirm that I needed it to be send to my work address witch of course hasn't.Last Saturday my partner was at home all day and I was I work all day, was expecting one of the 2 adresses to get delivered.I receive a mail saying that they tried to deliver to my home address (still don't understand why !!! ) but no one came.Got in touche with some guys from asos who guarantee they will deliver to my work address again on Monday. (today ) Still nothing and no news from Asos -Very unhappy prob the last time that I order with them if I don't receive my item.They should make sure that their client receive what they pay for.Not the case ...

Title: good for clothes shopping
Review: been using for both mine & my daughters clothes since Christmas and fond them to be efficient. Need more sales though ;)

Title: Only praise from me
Review: Placed my order for multiple items on Friday morning.  Qualified for free next day delivery.  Was pleased to see that asos use dpd so had an hour slot where I could live track parcels. Saturday lunchtime my items are with me and I'm very pleased with the clothing, service and delivery.  Really impressive over all and will get my business again.

Title: terriable delivery and customer service !!!
Review: They have awful delivery service I've had many problems. I wanted my delivery for next day and they did not deliver. In addition  they have put it through at standard delivery. My friend had the same problem they delivered her order after 2 months!! Never ordering from asos again!

Title: Good, but troubles with delivery
Review: I would defiently shop at ASOS again, it's easy to use the site and have a lot of lovely things, and cheap too! I bought a bag, it's super easy, big plus, BUT the delivery took a bit longer than expected and I missed a good track and trace service.

Title: Horrific Customer Service
Review: Received my order on time. Unfortunately an item was missing. Not only did they not resend out the missing order, their customer care team was rude and declared my account was no longer active and would not be doing anything in terms of a refund or replacement. Unbelievable how a company of this size can treat a customer like this.

Title: Used many times but let down on the last few orders
Review: I've always used ASOS to shop ever since they first started and have always rated them for their quick delivery. I've placed a number of orders over the last week for dresses to wear to weddings over the summer. Disappointingly on two occasions i have received my parcels with the dresses screwed up in the bag. These have been satin £80+ dresses arriving in a really poor creased state. The latest order was an £80 Warehouse dress which had clearly been worn as there were drink stains down the front and it smelt like someone has sweated in it all day - not what you want to receive when ordering especially items at this price !

Title: Untrustworthy unreliable and indifferent
Review: I bought a dress from ASOS on May 25th and they told me that it would be with me by June 8th. Mind you that June 8th was their closing date. I needed the dress for an event on June 10th, so I was pretty confident that I would be OK and ready to go.Now that I am writing this, it is the 11th of June,still no dress and their customer services are useless.I sent them a series of complaints and their steady answer is "Sorry, these things happen, wait another week, go to your postal office and if all else fails,talk to us in a week".Absolutely disappointing and useless service.Never buying from them again.

Title: Good custumer service
Review: Recently my sunglasses broke, then i wrote to Asos about it and they send me a new pair the day afterReally good custumer service

Title: AMAZING
Review: Always very accurate, fast and never had any problems. I am a premier member and its worth it :)!

Title: Do not by from ASOS worst company ever
Review: Still havnt received my shoes or had a refund, whatever you do don't leave a message with the receptionist NATALIE to try and sort out there mistakes which let me tell you there are plenty of. When you leave a message with her it never reaches were it is suppose to, made millions of phone calls which get you nowhere except an expensive phone bill. And emails do not get replied to no matter how many you send. Here's a list of the so called customer care team who you don't want to deal with, JAMES, HUGO, NATALIE, WORST (receptionist) EVER,  PHILIPPE  the manager who hasn't got a clue what's going, all he does is pass the blame on to someone else, well done PHILIPPE take a bow. CARRIE ANNE customer experience team, she needs to look up the word in a dictionary because she obviously does not no the meaning of the word. Take my advice and save yourself a lot of hassle from this absolute joke of a company and DO NOT BY FROM THEM.

Title: Very happy with asos service
Review: I got my parcel,perfect service as usual,i recommed asos

Title: Great Shopping Experience
Review: I am a regular ASOS shopper and have been for years now. They stock a great selection and provide free deliveries and returns. The only problem I have ever had is that deliveries do not always arrive on time but customer support are always quick to respond to and solve any problem or queries.

Title: Ummmm ?
Review: Well the site is really expensive so i ordered some makeup ..The shades of the concealer and foundation weren't as expected . no promo codes that sucks.packaging was cute though.

Title: LOVE them
Review: i'm always ordering from ASOS!! probably my favourite online store and even when i find other products from river island, new look etc. i always check if ASOS have them in stock as i prefer the service from them! amazing with delivery, offers and refunds with every order. will always be a customer :)!

Title: The Incompetence is staggering
Review: The extent of this company's incompetence is appalling. I ordered a 3 pack of t-shirts and a pair of shoes. The shoes are 2 RIGHT FEET. Not only that, One is a size 9 and the other is a size 9.5! NOT ONLY THAT, I ORDER A SIZE 10.5! NOT ONLY THAT, THEY SENT THE WRONG SHOE! That's 5 mistakes on one item.THERE WERE NO SHIRTS IN THE PACKAGE EITHER! They immediately refunded my order when I got them on the phone, which was nice. But I asked customer service if they could offer me free shipping to keep me as a customer and I would gladly replace the order. And they said NO! Not even to rectify their own incompetence. Now I have to waste time shipping their mistakes back to them.

Title: My order was sent back without notice
Review: I was waiting for my parcel and just when I thought that it was taking a very long time, I received an email that it is returned to ASOS, without notice? I contacted the CS and they gave me a standard answer: DHL couldn't reach you so they sent it back and please check your spam. Well, the address given is an international company and when I checked the status it says: delivered in Germany, but my address is in The Netherlands. So this is clearly a fault of the shipping company: they never contacted me, I checked my email. I don't like to fact that CS clearly didn't check the tracking info and just gave me a standard answer, basically saying: it is your own fault... So when I still want the product I can order again if it is still available... Well, no, thank you : what a bad service, never again.

Title: Next day delivery!
Review: Whenever I have dealt with the customer service team they are great and I do enjoy shopping with Asos. However I placed an order the other day and spent over £100, I opted for free next day delivery. Unfortunately I didn't receive the next day service because I didn't type in next day in capitals in the promo part. I do not think the instructions are very clear and because of this I won't be getting my items in time for an occasion. This is something that needs to be improved so the next person doesn't make the same mistake.

Title: Excellent!
Review: Love Asos. Always deliver on time!

Title: Har aldrig handlet med en virksomhed med så god service!
Review: Super service !!

Title: I love Asos!
Review: I always enjoy shopping at Asos. Things are pretty cheap and the service is good. Even though I live in Denmark, I receive my orders rather quick. I have nothing to complain about.

Title: Disgusting company!
Review: I could not get through to the site on the day of the promotion as their site had crashed and they would not give me a code for the next day. Absolutely disgusted and I will never use them again.

Title: Usually great service turns into conning it's own premier customers.
