Review: Usually love ASOS and I'm subscribed to Premier.However their most recent discount code which took 20% off everything, I tried to order 2 items, I was repeating the process on all devices from 6pm up until midnight before giving up and going to bed. I managed to place an order on 1 of the items the following day, and the code was valid however my second item magically appeared out of stock. I checked back to purchase later as I had an email to say it was back in stock the code has now expired, (this is a matter of 2 hours) so they obviously haven't received a brand new delivery and updated stock, it was taken out to avoid the code. I got in touch with ASOS asking for them to add this to my order, or give me another code, but they refused, and said 'CONGRATULATIONS YOU MANAGED TO USE YOUR 20% CODE ON YOUR 1st ITEM.' This just seemed like rubbing it in, the worst possible way. Very disappointed as they completely ignored my problem and decided to gloat about it.

Title: Good offers, always quickly delivered, simple returns
Review: I've used ASOS quite a few times now and so far have always had a good experience with them.  As you'd expected ordering clothes online a few items don't fit or suit you but returning and getting refunds is always easy and works.  I usually select the free delivery option but still seem to get very quick delivery.I was surprised to see some poor reviews on here so it's a shame others have had problems.  However my own experience of ordering and returning, all using the online system (not needed to, or tried to contact by phone) has been great.They also email me with lots of offers which is good, as not too spammy and I like their selection of clothes.

Title: Really bad costumer service
Review: Yesterday you had a promo code "sadly" your site was down all day/night.. I didn't get thru to the site and lost the opportunity to buy. I dont believe this is a coincidence.. Why can you guys not extend the 20% off?Hope you are realising what this do to your costumers. This is ridiculous!

Title: satisfied
Review: 1.a big range of clothing2.nice prices3.polite customer service4.when i had a problem with my order i found a solution(refund my money the first time and resent me my order another time)5.sometimes it is too late to deliver the products6.i did not like the fact that now i have to pay for shipping costs under 30e.(Before it was free)

Title: Poor
Review: I bought a 3 piece suit from asos and a hip flask. The suit was stated as been navy and in pictures it was but when it arrived it was black. This same delivery had rust on the hip flask and the trousers where missing. I did notify asos about the missing trousers they replied within the hour to let me know they have sent my missing item through the post. Then 2 days after I had an email to say they are out of stock. This was my first time buying from asos and probably the last.

Title: Worst
Review: Worst place to shop online. Never deliver on time even though they charge you.

Title: Worst Customer service.
Review: So...I have a premium membership for asos in US. I bought often on a short period of time..as I landed here with one small suitcase. Unfortunately they became worst every day...wrong size item delivered, custom service incapable of understanding my problem. Be aware of the refunds: I bought a few items in total of over 150 USD. They had a promo code at that time that offer me a 30 USD discount. Great I was thinking. Well one of the items (a 34 USD shirt) was bad and didn't fit me. I RETURNED IT hoping for a refund. Guess what: they refund me only 4 USD as in their opinion the discount is taken out when it comes to refund ( the whole discount, even if I returned just one item) So I ended up paying the whole amount of money (- 4 USD) and one item less. Now that is business. I asked them to return the item at least as I could offer it as gift to someone. Their response: my issue has been adressed and canceled and if I want to discuss it again, I can do it in 14 days...Like start over etc.

Title: Great shipping experience
Review: On Sunday night I ordered a pair of shoes to be shipped here in New Zealand and I received them on Friday morning which is what I was hoping for but not expecting! Great price. Cheaper than I can get in stores here, even with shipping.

Title: Meh.
Review: Loved asos at first back when they had free shipping no limits. over time they have just gotten worse. At first i noticed they slowly raised the shipping cost ''spend $40 for free shipping". And their price promise is ridiculous considering they only price promise UK sites and over price things that are non-uk so you cant get a price match.. now after emailing customer service so much, i have only noticed they seem so clueless and act stupid. Oh and their shipping speed is terribly slow, i have been waiting 4 weeks for a simple dress only to find out they ''lost'' it.  way to go asos.

Title: There is no customer service
Review: I have sent 5 emails through the website and 2 from my email as a "reply" to the confirmation because I didn't know what else \to do. Have never heard back. They are awful.

Title: Pleasing
Review: Delivery was good & clothes even better :)

Title: So happy with service and sweater
Review: I ordered a Wildfox sweater and was worried after reading bad reviews of this company. I got an email saying my item shipped the same day I ordered it. It had a link to check tracking info. My item arrived in 3 business days instead of the 4 days I paid only $6 for shipping. I am so happy with my experience and my sweater was perfect!

Title: Awful business
Review: Ordered one simple pair of sunglasses over three weeks ago and took a week to even get processed and shipped out.  Received shipment email and with a tracking #, except to even track shipment(which isn't working) you have to sign in every time.  It's almost been two more weeks and I have yet to receive them.

Title: Getting worse
Review: I used to buy from asos very often, although they seem to be becoming progressively worse. I've had to return 4 items due to them being the wrong item/size or damaged on arrival. Customer service is non existent - they just send the same standardised email. The returns process is a nightmare. I find myself constantly sending emails to remind them that my items have reached their returns facility. A while ago the refunds were processed in around 3-5 days, although now it takes around 1-2 weeks!  I'll give them 3 stars as sometimes you can find good bargains and the delivery is very fast.

Title: Love ASOS!!
Review: I love asos and have been shopping here a while, I have a premium account which means I pay just £10 a year for free next day delivery whenever I want it and sometimes even get an email saying I can shop  the sale 24 hours before everyone else :)!! Delivery is fab! It's always on time and returns are so simple and free! Excellent website! Always the first I look on when I need something

Title: Great
Review: Delivery is prompt and efficent, quality is good, website full of inspiration - excellent all round.

Title: Pleasantly surprised
Review: I was searching the web to find a pair of sandals and found a website that advertised numerous companies. I found some I liked and placed an order for 2 pair. I never heard of the website ASOS so I searched for a review and was concerned about the rating. I know, I should have done this first. I tried to cancel but it was too late. I watched my emails and had regular statues updates of my shipment and received my order within 7 days. Unfortunately when they came the sandals were too small so I ordered 2 more in the right size and mailed the other ones back. I thought that it would take forever to get the refund but I was refunded in 12 days. I also received my second order within 6 days no problem. I love the sandals and have not found any like them sold anywhere else. This was a pleasant surprise considering all the bad reviews I read from other customers.

Title: Poor customer service, item tagged incorrectly so wrong size but no refund
Review: I ordered a size 6 dress. I received a dress with tags hanging off it which said 6. I had tried this dress on elsewhere so knew it would fit. I only bought from asks because it was cheaper. When I got on holiday and put my nice new evening dress on it was horribly baggy. I rechecked the tag which said 6 and so as I had no other dress wore it. Later when I was packing I checked the wash instruction label which said size 8. The dress was tagged incorrectly which is their mistake. Their customer services were unapologetic and said I should have checked all the tags and labels. I think this is rubbish customer service as who in all honestly checks the price tag with the size on  AND the wash instructions label inside the bottom of a dress when they buy it?

Title: Wrong Item
Review: I am normally quite happy with the service. However, this time I have ordered a shirt that i really needed for this week. Guess what?? I have opened a parcel and instead of a blue shirt there was a black summer dress. Really upset. Not happy when you rely on service and then they let you down. Posted it back and asked for refund as I don't need this shirt anymore. ADVICE- Whoever pack orders please double check that you pack a correct item

Title: customer service?
Review: Absolutely the worst online customer service! ASOS  placed  the wrong address on my package, making it undeliverable. Now I will  not have my items for an event or even a refund for 10+ days (event is in 14 days) don't waste your time or money with this site.

Title: A Poor Experience Spread Over the Period of a Week
Review: I've had an awful experience with ASOS over the period of the past week. Repeatedly, I have been requested to reexplain my problem; repeatedly, my explanations of the problem have been ignored.  Situation is this: ASOS failed to deliver an ordered product by the date they said that it would arrive. ASOS then failed to understand that I had moved following that date and insisted that I continue waiting to see if the package would arrive (just to reiterate, I no longer lived at the address). As of today, they still are requesting for me to check around the premises of the address in the city in which I no longer live. Wherever ASOS'S customer service takes place, either the people are poor at performing their work (I've dealt with multiples) or the policies they have in place are meant for money saving rather than customer satisfaction. I will no longer shop with this company and am awaiting a return of my funds. I will also make this purchase elsewhere.

Title: caring and warm
Review: I'm 17 weeks pregnant and pushed my luck buying a beautiful summer dress (not maternity) it was literally a little tight for my relaxing comfort and arranged to return. Wondering about refunds I sent an email only to find one back within minutes by a girl called Jessica, she couldn't have spoken any better congratulating me on my baby and wishing me well and a great weekend. From a stranger I have never spoken to someone so thoughtful. I closed my email with a huge smile on my face, thankyou Jessica :) *****

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Out of all the online stores I've shopped at this has definatley got to be the worst for customer service. After several times using ASOS, i have the same bad experience. -If you try to call in; DON'T, it will take you 30mins till someone answers the phone because their customer service line is in SPAIN!!!-They fail to deliver on time/day.   - If you need something for a certain day, don't bother with ASOS, they will not make that happen. A message for ASOS; you need a UK Based Customer service line, better service and better shipping agreements. Sincerely, annoyed customer.

Title: Love love love
Review: I use ASOS all the time, in fact that is my main shop for clothing now. I return my fair share as well and it has the best return service of any online retailer.

Title: I Love this company, have been a customer for 3+ years!
Review: I absolutely love this clothing company, best customer service, fast shipping, I don't order clothes anywhere else!! one of my favourite online stores ever! Never had a problem always happy with my orders. Thank you so much for the best service. :)  Nora Beha

Title: Consistent in service although quality of own-brand can vary
Review: free delivery and returns, amazing selection, happy to keep using them

Title: Not even worth one star
Review: I have my baby shower next weekend . I finally found a dress I liked on asos. I needed express so I clicked express then received email stating won't be delivered until after my baby shower so I had 30 min to cancel. I canceled and then says takes 10 days for money back in account. I can't re order without those funds. They wouldn't add express shipping on my order or let me reorder without paying again for another dress . Which I can't do or I'm desperate enough I might have. Now I'm totally screwed. They don't tell you they don't refund you right away and even if you clicked express it doesn't always work. Don't order from them

Title: Absolutely Amazing
Review: This company is fast, efficient and easy to order from.  The selection is excellent and if you are not happy with your order for any reason, the customer service team is extremely helpful.  Refunds are processed on or even sometimes before the stated date.  All in all AMAZING. Lisa

Title: Brilliant!
Review: Easy to order (best app shopping I have found yet).Very helpful staff, when I needed to return, the return was quick and easy and processed quickly. Great quality products!

Title: Favorite fashion website
Review: I love asos - good inspiration, delivery and returning.

Title: Great delivery service
Review: Ordered a dress at 10pm arrived next day at 10am. Always have fantastic offers on

Title: Geat website
Review: Love this website. Great products. Never had any issues except one time that I received a poor quality item, however they were very kind when I contacted them and refunded me. I believe the customer service to be good and it is definitely a reliable website.

Title: Really fast dealing with an issue
Review: I bought a pair of Religion Shoes from ASOS recently, but I choose the wrong shoe size for it. Was a little bit upset, because of my own stupidity, because I have simply chosen the wrong one myself... So I saw in the delivery bag that there are some return/refund forms. Quickly filled it in, hoping they will swap the size and return it to me. (Was actually prepared to lose both my money and the shoes) Surprisingly for me -> Went to the post office - no charge on the ship, 3 days later - new shoes at my doorsteps - this time - perfect size! Reaally surprised! 5/5 Made me happy, will use it again!

Title: Absolutely terrible
Review: -Due to a system error, the express shipping that I had requested had not gone through. I needed this immediately, and due to this, it was already a day delayed.-I had to cancel the order so that I could re-order it. -Of the two dresses I was sent, one was a wrong dress (also in the wrong size)-I returned both and was only partially refunded. So disappointed by these endless problems, on just one order!

Title: Speedy delivery
Review: I only have great experiences with Asos, no hassle, loads of choice and speedy delivery

Title: Customer Service is Horrible!!!
Review: Long story short ASOS has gone down hill since I begin shopping with them almost 5 years ago. They leave off items, parcels go missing and then they refuse to refund. I have a missing parcel over $500 and they had the audacity to say let me know is there anything we can do after I specifically told them it was missing!! Then they emailed me back saying to ship the items back and they will return the funds back to my account. Unbelievable!!!! If you have any issues with these fools just go directly to your bank or credit card company and dispute it that way!

Title: Horrible
Review: Shoppers beware. ASOS is the absolute worse. They're customer service is next to nill. The lie and tell you one thing and do another and God forbid if you get the same person (you can only contact them through email, FB or Twitter) with a generic message back. I have been fighting with them over a refund that I shouldn't have even had to request as the order was to be cancelled but they sent anyway. Then they're only trying to refund part of my money. No dice. I have filed an affidavit of fraud against the company.

Title: Poor customer service
Review: I placed an order that took almost 2 weeks to arrive!  Never had this experience with an online company.  I complained about it and while they responded promptly, all they offered was a 10% discount on a future order with a code that expired in 1 month!  I asked for an extension of the code validity length and was told that wasn't possible and I could join them on Facebook or Twitter to find out about discounts.  I'm done with them!

Title: ASOS breached sales contract
Review: BEWARE this online retailer do not refund cancelled orders,  email requests go unanswered my bank are taken action to recover the funds , asos are very obstructive with no direct means of communication arrogant and unconcerned attitude to customer service as well as practices that verge on  deception.

Title: Fast and AMAZING !
Review: I ordered from here Friday 1st may. And I already got my package this Monday! I have never experienced a delivery so fast over weekend and I am truly impressed!

Title: Avoid if you want to receive what you've bought!
Review: I received an email stating I had been refunded as I'd returned the goods. Remarkable as I never received the parcel and had already notified them that it had not arrived by the promised date. Replies were entirely generic and useless.

Title: Worst experience ever
Review: I had the worst experience ordering from ASOS. I was really excited to order this item from the store but when it came in it was a different item entirely. When asked for a replacement the item was out of stock. I will not be ordering from this site ever again.

Title: Terrifying Experience!!!!!!!!!!
Review: I ordered a pair of shoes about a week from today.  My order was supposed to be here yesterday. I have not received a update or anything notifying me that there is a delay, or If i will receive them.  I am so disappointed, a few friends advised me that this site is good and now this happens.  I wish that i did look into reviews.  The shoes i ordered was for a event i have to attend tomorrow and it does not look like i will have them.  There is no tracking number, What kind of service is this?  The products look nice but the service is horrible . Very disappointed customer!!!!!!!!!!!!

Title: Horrible experience!
Review: Why didn't I read the reviews before ordering?! I ordered a dress for my baby shower and paid to have it 2 day express shipped. My confirmation email stated the garment would arrive on or BEFORE 4/27. I did not receive the garment until 6pm on 4/29. That isn't even the worst part! When I opened the package it was 2 SIZES TOO BIG!!! I contacted "customer service" and was told I ordered a US size 10 which is equivalent to a UK 14. Only problem is that the tag says UK 18 and US 14. I will never order from this site again which is sad because they have great designs.

Title: Satisfied
Review: I've ordered from ASOS.com 3-4 times I think, and every time, my stuff came in about 5-6 days. (I live in Denmark) Good prices too :)No problemo

Title: Scam
Review: The worst customer service! The quality is very poor, shipping is supper slow. When I returned the items, didn't refund the full amounts. Stay away from shopping here. Scam place!!'

Title: Consistent
Review: One thing I love about ASOS is their consistency. Every time I order I receive what was expected, the pictures are a true representation of the clothes. Its and added bonus that they have the catwalk videos of their clothing. Always reliable, and my go to online shopping !

Title: Worst delivery service ever-a pigeon would be quicker
Review: Last time i checked Northern Ireland was part of the UK yet it's taken nearly 5 days for two dresses to get to me?! SERIOUSLY ASOS, YOU need to MAJORLY review your delivery options.

Title: Good Service
Review: I have been purchasing from Asos for over a year now, and I have not yet experienced anything bad.  They have delivered very good quality clothing and service.  I had a problem a few weeks a ago, where an item was faulty, I emailed them regarding the Jacket and told them that after wearing it a couple of times the threads started going lose. They sent me a replacement immediately. Which was just the best service I have received from any online retailer for a long time.   5 stars from me ! :)

Title: first time very happy
Review: Receives goods today ordered 21st  packaged neatly and was notified every step of they way. Items lovely much better then other clothing sites. Thanks guys

Title: UNRELIABLE, IMPOSSIBLE TO DEAL WITH, STAY AWAY
Review: Like many others, I placed an order for a wedding suit and paid for an overnight DHL delivery (within Europe!). The delivery was first attempted only 8 days later, 3 days after the wedding. By that stage we left Europe. Aside from the very awkward no-suit situation, my endless attempts to receive my money for items that have never been received has so far been unsuccessful. I was forced to file a dispute with PayPal to sort the things out. In the meantime, ASOS keeps giving promises to 'get back shortly', to 'resolve issues within 2 weeks', and has not fulfilled a single one: no refund, no response, the issue has been dragging on for a month!! Never again will I deal with them. IF you have a misfortune of dealing with them, my advice: always use Paypal. Always!

Title: I've been robbed!! BEWARE!
Review: I ordered a denim jacket. I had to return it due to the size I ordered not fitting correctly. About 10 days after returning the item, I was emailed a refund confirmation message stating that I would be refunded within 10 days. Well, that never happened. I then emailed asos after the ten days to see when I'd get my refund. And they said wait another 2-3 days. Well, I waited 2-3 days, and 2-3 days turned into 2-3 weeks. Even after that, I still didn't get my refund. Well let's just say 2 months has passed and I still ain't  gotten my got'damn money back. I emailed them again and they wanted bank statements and other personal info, and from there I couldn't trust it and was convinced it was a scam. I would persuade buyers to not shop here unless you want to be robbed of your hard earned money. Asos is ridiculous.

Title: hello no.
Review: i ordered a pair of shoes for my best friend for her birthday. it seemed as if everything was fine: they sent me a tracking number and a delivery date, all that i forwarded to her. they came on time, thank goodness, but they were the wrong size. i specifically ordered a size 11, my best friend says she received 9. what!? like how does that happen? let's just hope i can get my money back without any confusion.

Title: Brilliant service
Review: My order came to over £100, so I had free next day delivery. I had not placed my order until 9pm, but I received it by lunchtime the next day. I needed to return two of the items, the shoes were too large (my fault, I thought I could get away with a larger size as my size was out of stock) and a dress which did not suite me at all. I sent the parcel back with the post office, using the pre-paid returns label and I had my full refund for these 2 items within about a week. Very efficient service. If I had one complaint, it would be that it seems a little faceless, I did not speak to anyone. But I was kept well informed with automated emails about despatch, delivery, tracking information, and when they had received my returned parcel back. Excellent online service, and great products.

Title: Good
Review: Great service & range of products :)

Title: item return ripoff
Review: Unless you have returned your item by registered mail to ASOS there is no way of determining if they ever receive the item and it is impossible to get a refund. Wonder how many others have had this problem?I was left over $65 out of pocket from returning an item when ASOS had shipped the incorrect to me in the first instance.

Title: Scam site
Review: Asos is a scam. They mine your personal data to get you to buy deals that arent that great to begin with. Dont give them your birthday, much less cooies of your ID.   They have no customer service and are maddening to try to deal with. Never again!

Title: worst scammy scumbags
Review: All you have to do is search for the scams these guys pull and youll never risk doing business with them again!

Title: Got way overcharged
Review: Beware when buying from Asos because I recently bought some t-shirts and during delivery, got an email saying that I need to pay over 100$ to have the order cleared from customs. They are not responsible for paying customs and duty, so expect to pay 20-30% more than the checkout price.But they do have a nice store.

Title: Hmm... expect it to be better
Review: I had mediocre experiences with ASOS. I just felt they couldve had better customer service. Shopped many times with them, i think they had wearable and trendy clothes. prices could get a little high sometimes, but they had regular discount, although it wasnt really something big. Shipping to US took forever, and I live in NYC, where everything/everytime i online shop usually took soo fast! They sent wrong items twice, and they had no efficient contact method to customer service such as Live chat or direct email. as much as i like to look around here, i cant be bothered to shop so often, id rather look at US online shops, they have great items too, and took much faster with better customer service where u can ask quick question and solve issues very quick!

Title: All good.
Review: It was all god, except that you have to pay for returns. It's really expensive!

Title: The best
Review: I ordered 2 days ago from UK with the DHL express delivery, and it came today.The product was in perfect shape when it arrived. I will definently use this website again, and i will recommend it to all of my friends/familly

Title: Love ASOS
Review: Personally, I LOVE ASOS. Clothes are great and affordable, free shipping to Aus locations and delivers quickly.

Title: Pleasant first time.
Review: My first experience with ASOS was a good one, always had updates for my package along with a tracking number, they sent a second one once the customs cleared. The package was also delivered a day earlier than expected! I am very satisfied and may order again from them soon. :)

Title: Good
Review: this is a good company my experience with them was great. First time shopper on asos- package came on time, one dress didtn fit so i returned in, they refunded me back to my credit card within 10 days . perfect, hassle free!

Title: OH MY GOSH!!!
Review: My order came with a dirty Christmas sock!!! WTH! I DIDNT ORDER A DIRTY CHRISTMAS SOCK. This is not a joke, nor would I be on here reviewing if it weren't true. I have a pic but there isnt a place for a picture. Never again. lol.

Title: Excellent
Review: Everything came on time, and came exactly as I ordered  it. When I had a question, they responded to me immediately with no hesitation. They are a reputable company, and  LOVE my new clothes!! I will absolutely order from them again.

Title: Great shop!
Review: I've shopped many times at ASOS, and I've only experienced great products and service. One time somehow my package delivery failed, and then ASOS gave me a promotion code for my next buy.Only positive experiences from here!

Title: You'll have to pay to return your items
Review: I bought two pairs of shoes which did not fit me . Now I have to send them back to ASOS in Poland - but ASOS will not pay for the return, though I bought for 1,700 DKK - and now I have to pay 300 DKK to return the goods. ASOS could put a label in the box they've send the items in so we can send the goods back to ASOS for a lower price. ASOS can only give me my money back, not sent me the shoes in the right size. That is so sad!

Title: Excellent Service
Review: Wonderful payment system and delivered ahead of time!

Title: Very unhappy about the Premium service
Review: I've been enjoying the Amazon Prime service for a few months now and wanted to give the Asos Premium a try. At the end of the day, I don't shop on Asos often enough to justify it but I wouldn't mind it if it wasn't for the Asos magazine that I now receive every two months and which is nothing more than a pile of ads for teenagers and fashion advice for teenagers, completely unadapted as I am definitely not a teenager (and Asos knows it as they have my date of birth :)). Once I had enough of carrying the magazine to the trash bin every two months and decided to get out of the Premium service I had to spent the entire evening on the Asos website (no way of unsubscribing from the mobile app) as there was some trouble with the site. To sum up, it was very easy to get started, it brought me nothing but trouble and I cannot get out of it now that I want to. Very disappointing of what is in general a trustworthy site providing seamless service.

Title: 3rd time it did not arrive
Review: Why my order did not arrived for the 3rd time?I'm receiving orders i make on other sites to my postal office , my adress is ok in your system but after i wait for 1 month you are saying  every time  that the package returned back without no explanation.Why are you not sending my orders? I don't know why i even bother but this has gone too far.

Title: Do not purchase from asos
Review: Think twice about placing an order with asos *BEWARE*I ordered a pair of trainers for a present and was informed the delivery will arrive within 3 days, all good so far! Later that day I received an email to say it will arrive within 10 days, a quick email to them to them about the delivery dates and was told they could cancel the order and I reorder selecting next day service. Why should I do that this was not my fault.Now 3 days after placing the order I received an email saying they was out of stock not sure when they was getting stock if at all and refunded the order. What a waist of time They have no phone number all is done via email as they are probably not trained in customer service at all  Poor poor poor service  Don't bother they won't have stock waist your time and now I have to wait 10 days for my money back  They even still have the trainers on there site which can still be purchased  So some poor customer will have the same issues I have experienced

Title: Twice
Review: I bought a dress and a pair of shoes, they all got damaged.

Title: Love this site
Review: I have used ASOS for about 5 years and its only getting better. Both desktop and mobile websites are very easy to use. Their customer care team are very quick to respond and I fully trust them.

Title: Thank you asos
Review: Just got my loafers today. Expected date was 03/26. Pretty decent as 28,29th were weekends. Loafers are exactly what i expected to be. Fits perfectly as they sent me the right size. To be honest i expected something to go wrong since reviews on asos are super nagative but i guess it not always like that. Only thing is... canada post charges you 30% for duty tax shat lol

Title: Sucks.
Review: I ordered a package March 9 and it was suppose to come in March 17th. it never came in & i gave if a few days, but it never came. I needed it by March 28th so got in contact with customer service and they said they would send a replacement order. I told them when i would need it by so they supposedly sent it through express delivery but it never came in on time. It finally came in March 31st. I doubt I will order from this company again because it i concierge and poor service.

Title: First time ordering, great service!
Review: I bought a dress off of ASOS for around $200 (CAN$). Shortly after ordering, I received a confirmation e-mail saying that I would receive the package on March 27th 2015. Shipping was great (I got it for free since I spent over $50) and it was quick! It took about two weeks, coming from the UK to Canada. However, when my package didn't arrive on March 27th, I e-mailed their customer care. I got an e-mail back really quickly, and they apologized and told me to wait a few more days. 2 days later, I got my dress! The dress looks a little bit different than it does in the picture, but all in all, it's all good! Their customer care was satisfactory, as they replied quickly and politely. The prices of the clothes on the website are also fair -- it depends on what you're purchasing, IMO. For the dress I bought, $200 was a fair price!  I'm glad I found this website and I will definitely be ordering from here in the future! BE SURE to check your sizes and to also convert if necessary :-)

Title: Total jokes
Review: Won't even go into detail on this but basically their company and the way it is run is a total joke! Forever receiving incorrect parcels! It's like trying to communicate with a bunch of monkeys.

Title: Very poor quality
Review: ive had enough of wasting my time now, the ASOS "quality" is beyond terrible. Cheap, nasty and always too small ( another way of cutting costs I assume) wasting more of my time writing this. Done.

Title: One of the top online stores I order from
Review: I order from Asos several times a year, and I think they are doing a great job. All of the items have clear descriptions, and if you read them carefully you can't go wrong with sizes and the quality of the materials. I have always received my orders in time, and my last order even came earlier than I expected. The only time when I received a faulty item, a dress which arrived without its belt, I contacted them and they decided to refund a part of the dress' value. I don't know why many people have had such bad experiences with Asos, but remember that when the items leave Asos' storehouse, you do not know who exactly handles them.  Congrats Asos for your great service and multitude of products. I will keep ordering from you.

Title: garbage...
Review: The  worst  service ever..will not order from here again. If you reading this review and planning on ordering form this trash website DONT DO IT..

Title: Worst Customer Service Experience
Review: My shipment of a dress for almost $200.00 did not arrive in time for my event, even if they promised it would. 5 days later it has still not come, there is no phone line and no tracking number. As far as I understand it is lost, and the company is doing nothing at all to accommodate.

Title: Consistently good service
Review: - Always get orders within outlined time- Clothes true to size- payment system is very convenient, straightforward and easy to use

Title: Not great.
Review: I bought a crochet beach top, when it arrived it had a fault right in the front so I filled the form out saying I wanted a replacement, over a week went by and after a couple of phone calls I got a message saying that my £25 has been refunded even though I asked for an exchange. Going back on the web site to reorder it and noticed that the price had gone up to £28 three pound dearer.  I did order it because I liked it but in the future I will shopping elsewhere, for being greedy and the sake of £3 they have lost a good customer, shame.This is an update on the above review. After Asos read this we received and apology and a refund of the £3, which was rounded up to £5 and they also gave us a £10 voucher, a mistake by Asos rectified. When mistakes are dealt with like this it restores one faith in the company.

Title: Some of the worst customer service ever. Not worth it.
Review: Okay, here's my experiences with ASOS: 1. For my first order, things went fine. Then, a few weeks later, I started receiving a style magazine (don't remember which one - Cosmopolitan, maybe?) in the mail. I hadn't ordered it, so I had no idea why I was receiving it. Called the magazine, and found out it was ASOS. I contacted ASOS and they said it was included with my order (even though it didn't advise me of that anywhere on the order page). So ASOS signed me up for a magazine I didn't want as part of my order. 2. My next order was a coat and a sweater. The coat is made by ASOS. I like the style, but I can tell you their stuff is cheaply made. The coat, which is a stretchy cotton, is pilling all over, and I've only worn it about 4 times. 3. For my next order, I got a good price on shoes (not made by ASOS) and was excited to receive them. About a week after my order, ASOS contacted me and advised that the shoes were out of stock and they were refunding my money. This in spite of the fact that their website continued to show that the shoes were available in my size. Grrr. 4. My most recent misery was a pair of Shellys London shoes. It's my third pair. Shellys London is always 2 size differences between the UK size and the US size. I ordered a size US 7 (which was the only option. The ASOS website didn't ask what UK size I wanted). I received the shoes, but received a UK 4, and it's printed on the shoes that they are a US 6. That's when the fun began. I contacted ASOS and said I received the wrong size. Long story short, I sent and received about 8 emails, all from a different agent each time, and was told first that there was a "problem with the sizing" (don't understand that, since the shoes state right on them what size they are in US sizes) and I could return them. I said no, I wanted the shoes I ordered. Then the next agent said she was ordering a replacement. I kept writing back and asking for confirmation that they were sending a UK 5. Finally an agent wrote back and said the replacement order was a UK 4. You know. The wrong size that I'd already received. I wrote back and asked ASOS to cancel a replacement of a UK 4, since that's what I already had, and the next agent told me they could only order one replacement, and since the wrong size had been ordered, I would have to return the shoes and order again. Two problems with that: first, it was pretty clear that if I ordered my size again, they would keep sending me a size smaller, and second, I got the shoes on a special and they cost more now. No response. Asked twice for a supervisor to review all of the emails (you can't actually call ASOS - only write the nitwits at their email service). The first "reply" was just a return of my email, with nothing written by ASOS. I wrote again to ask for a supervisor to review all of the emails, and they've gone radio silent. Seriously. ASOS is not worth it. It's like trying to communicate with a bunch of 13-year olds who've been drinking Red Bull all day.

Title: Shipping takes a while
Review: I had ordered things from ASOS before and once it took about 2 months for a pair of measly socks to arrive luckily when ordering my prom dress it didnt take much longer than 3 weeks. That restored my faith in ASOS.

Title: Delivery service is great but Returns (hermes) is terrible
Review: ASOS offered DPD returns before but they now use Hermes who lose half of all return parcels! I buy from Asos because returns were easy, which is important due to the nature of the products (you buy 4 pairs when you need only 1 for perfect  fit) but I think I'm considering buying from elsewhere to avoid my returns from going missing. ASOS please go back to using DPD for returns!

Title: horrible service
Review: The "help" desk is a joke. They do not honor valid promo codes. When I emailed about it they refused to do anything about it and during the wait the shoes I wanted old out :/ ... I was prepared to spend close to $500.  **also I am waiting for my refund on a swimsuit that didn't work out that I sent back 2 weeks ago... they claim it has to do with "snow in Ohio"... there hasn't been a lot of snow in Ohio in 4 weeks. Not worried about the refund just disappointed in the lack of customer service.

Title: Love it
Review: I have ordered several times from ASOS and I'm always happy about my products. There was an instance when I ordered lipstick and got the wrong shade. Unfortunately, I noticed this after opening the emballage, but decided to contact the customer service anyway with pictures as proof. I got a reply the first time that I could pay for a new lipstick because I opened the emballage so I couldn't send it back, and I thanked them for their reply (even though I wasn't very happy with it). I later got a reply from another staff member telling me that they were very sorry about the mistake and that I could keep the lipstick and they would send me a new one in the right shade - for free! I got my lipstick a few days later, but once again in the wrong shade. I decided to just make a new order instead of complaining to them again. Other than that, I have always gotten the right items and my packages have always arrived. The only problems I have had have been with the postage service here in Denmark (not ASOS' fault). I would absolutely recommend this webshop!

Title: So damn unprofessional..
Review: March 6 i ordered two Lipbalms online. As i live in Denmark I thought their delivery date March 12 was cool. But i was surprised... I can't think of any more unprofessional treatment.. March 16 i send them an email. I was told to wait 3 working days, and then they asked me to contact my local postoffice. (My localpostcenter couldn't see that they had anything to me...) Today it is March 20, still haven't received the damn lip balms.  The have just answered my second email, and asked after my adress.. (Like they dont have it already - actually they have two - both my workadress and privateadress.....) I just sitting here in Denmark, getting more and more frustrated - missing what i have ordered AND PAYED...... !!!

Title: Never had a problem
Review: Love this website! first place I look for anything! Free shipping and returns make online shopping so easier in case I get the wrong size etc. Will carry on shopping here.

Title: No complaints
Review: Have been shopping at Asos several times, and have never had any problems.

Title: Wish I would have read these reviews before I ordered.
Review: First, how do they not have a phone number listed for customer service?Second, how can items sent through the postal system not have tracking information or number?I order online a lot and I have never dealt with any company like this.  My expected delivery was March 16, 2015 and here it is passed and I still don't have my order.  This is my first time and I'm pretty sure my last time ordering from ASOS.  This really has me worried because I'm very cautious of the online sites I order from.  Hopefully my money didn't get taken because that will be a serious problem!  I hope my order comes some time this week no later then next. I have also emailed them, hopefully I get a response back soon.  If you care and value you money and time, don't order from them.

Title: Unhelpful!!
Review: Shocked by the lack of service received from ASOS "Customer Care" after contacting them about my delivery. I emailed them concerned that the courier had tried to deliver the items at lunch time during the week twice and I was at work so unable to accept the delivery. Queue patronising email from ASOS telling me to choose next day evening delivery next time....charming!!!

Title: NEVER TRUST ASOS ESPECIALLY INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
Review: I ordered Moschino bag that costs me £178 and it was shipped on 19th Feb and by right I was supposed to received it latest by 10th March . There is NO tracking number provided! (I bet ASOS is using the cheapest 'FREE SHIPPING' option just to cut the cost even for an expensive item). Until now I have not receive my item when asked about it, they asked me to wait until 30th March! Better buy from House of Fraser!

Title: Cheap but high quality products!
Review: I bought a couple of shirts and a tie for my brother, both were delivered quick and painful! Very satisfied, I'll shop there again soon!

Title: Two separate orders, both with wrong sizes.
Review: Two separate orders, both with wrong sizes.  Customer support closed out my "queries" before resolving them.  ASOS has good prices, and good products.  Just lacking customer service and attention to detail.

Title: Favourite place to shop online
Review: I've used ASOS for years now and found them to be extremely reliable! there's been the odd occasion of getting the wrong item shipped or purchasing something that was out of stock but they are always quick to refund. Customer service have always been swift and helpful. I'd recommend ASOS to everyone!

Title: Excellent again.
Review: My daughter was looking for a prom dress. She found 2 Lipsy dresses that she loved and they were available on ASOS reduced from £89 to £22 - fantastic! Ordered 2 in each size as my daughter was unsure what size she would be. Order was placed at 9pm Tuesday evening and delivered by 11am the next morning! An unbelievably fast service. Dresses were beautiful and I was able to return the unwanted items for free with the pre-paid label supplied. I have used ASOS many times and they are always excellent.

Title: Absolutely Excellent!!!!!
Review: Customer service was absolutely excellent, dealt with my problem straight away and I couldn't of asked for anymore.

Title: Girlfriend Enjoys her gift
Review: I bought my girlfriend a dress for her birthday, she loved it, its been 3 months and she still wears it occasionally despite me washing it wrong and shrinking it haha!

Title: Great service :)
Review: I was so surprised to see bad reviews on here!!! I've used so many times and had such a great experience with their products and service...one time the items didnt fit me, I sent them back via the sooo easy returns process and was refunded very quickly - perfect service :) thank you asos

Title: Fantastic!
Review: I had alot of great experience with Asos.com. I've ordered many there many times before, and i've never had problems with the webside. It's a great service, and fast delivery! So i would definitely recommend Asos.com

Title: Bad customer service team
Review: I ordered an item exactly 2 weeks ago. About 3 days after my order i received an email saying my parcel will be slightly delayed. They did not mention exactly how many days will be delayed. I sent them an email about 4 days ago to ask for updates but nobody replied. Only got a computer generated email  saying they'll get back to me. Now it has been 14 days, no parcel, items are not even shipped yet, and no one from customer service will talk to me. Very disappointed.

Title: great service. :)
Review: Could not ask for more from Asos. Customer care team super efficient!! Two orders that I have now purchased have been Fab.Very prompt on their reply via email and very helpful throughout my query. Thank you. Would defo order again!

Title: Just not good enough...
Review: I’ve used ASOS a few times now and whilst the website and selection of products is usually good and I haven’t had an issue before it’s my most recent order that I felt could have been dealt with better. I ordered my  girlfriend something for her birthday, the box was dumped in my front garden and when I found it there was a pool of water on it that soaked through into the contents. Fortunately what I’d purchased itself came in a box that itself had a presentation box in it so whilst both of these boxes suffered water damage the item at the very centre survived intact and I was able to present it to my girlfriend, albeit quite soggy… Now, I suspect you’re wondering how this is ASOS’ fault but it’s the registering of my complaint and the response that I’m disappointed with. Firstly, after several attempts using the “Contact Us” I found no way to get an email through to them without claiming it was a wrong item that had been delivered – nothing other than packaging was ruined but I had to make a real effort just to get through the labyrinth of a system so it would allow me to make contact with someone. I sent photos and a description of what happened and received a prompt response apologising, saying they’d pass on my experience to the courier and that I could return the item should I wish… This if anything would lead to more aggravation as I’d now have to wait in for delivery again or face the real possibility of a package being left someone even worse like a bin or the doorstep. I explained that a replacement wasn’t desirable and that no further action was required as they obviously had limited means to do anything - this was met with an immediate response apologising again and offering me a 15% discount code to be used within a month. … So, the way they intend to fix the problem I had with delivery and the disappointment is to get me to buy more stuff from them. Ultimately they see me spending more of my money whilst leaving my original concern unresolved is the answer – it isn’t.

Title: Absolute nightmare
Review: I bought a gift card for my wife recently. She could not find anything on the site she liked and so asked me to organise a refund. Three days later and 10 emails I still have no joy! Rubbish company who gladly take your cash but will not help when you want a simple refund.Why dont they just provide a phone number!

Title: Speedy delivery
Review: Great range to choose from, never had any issues. Out of all the online clothes delivery companies this is one of the better ones!

Title: asos they are average clothing group
Review: everything $100 and above is is acceptable at Asos ,however lower priced pieces do not have quality :(

Title: My favourite company for online shopping.
Review: Always some sort of offer going on, especially if you are a Premier member, delivery is ALWAYS on time and packaged correctly!

Title: Perfect!
Review: I really love shopping at Asos. Im from Denmark and I have never been disapointed in any way. I have always received my clothes before the date they promised me, and I really think that the quality of the clothes is perfect. And really cheap as well!  Love it!

Title: sucks
Review: sucks most of the timehardly anything that looks like the picturescustomerservice bad because of lacking of moral skillssizes are rarely how they seembad quality etc

Title: awful service.
Review: I ordered an outfit from here for a concert I was going to. I recieved the item when they said it was going to be delivered, so that was good, but it looked nothing like the pictures in person. I was very disappointed and planned on returning it when I realized there was no return address or exchange forms that came with the item. I then contacted customer service and told them about the problem, not only did it take them a very long time to even respond, but when I did get a response it was VERY rude. They are extremely difficult to deal with and I have yet to receive a return address from them. While in the process of trying to figure what their return address even is, I was informed that you only have 28 days to return an item. Maybe if they would have responded quicker with a return address I could've made the return but no, I still have an ugly dress that no one in their right mind would wear and $50 gone. There is nothing legit about this company and I garuntee that I will never ever buy from them again.

Title: I was really impressed!
Review: So I ordered a scarf on the 10th of February on the website ASOS and I was able to track down my order on the Hermes website. After It said on the 14th of February that my parcel is with my local delivery man I was really happy that I could get my parcel so quick. Later it said on the Hermes website that my parcel is left at the porch but I couldn't find it anywhere, not at my porch and not left at my neighbors. I was really disappointed so I immediately contacted the ASOS customer service for help. They replied to me within 6 hours and offered me to replace my scarf and even upgrade my order to another delivery company so I wouldn't have to be bothered with Hermes again. I'm hoping to get my scarf soon but for now I'm really grateful for the fast and helpful customer service at ASOS and thanks to Jamie!

Title: No issues with first order
Review: Found a nice looking Tweed wallet on Asos - pretty well priced at £15.00 - order placed on a Sunday, and arrived with no hassles on Wednesday. Can't comment on the quality of customer service as I've never needed to contact them but the order confirmation and despatch emails were timely and gave the info I wanted/needed. The wallet itself looks very nicely made with no imperfections in stitching or finish. Top marks, lads and lasses, I'll be back for more at a later date!

Title: SHOCKING
Review: Needed an outfit for weekend ordered an ASOS Skater dress on the wednesday for next day delivery to have by thursday so it could be worn on saturday. Fine.Waited all day for the item to arrive at 6pm so that kind of annoyed me regardless i was happy it had came on said date. However i tried on the dress - it was horrible cheap elasticy material so debating wether or not just to wear it as i had no other choice when i noticed a HUGE hole down the seam. I called ASOS customer service - whoever hired the two employees i had dealt with needs shot! they were arrogant and totally rude. After being cut off from the SECOND person i called back as i wanted refunded and absolutely could not fault the third person she arranged for a refund of dress, delivery and assured if i wanted to choose another item i would get that delivered for free too.Unfortunately though that one lovely woman cannot make up for a faulty item and truly awful customer service.Reluctant to shop here again!

Title: This company tries to steal from you
Review: So, this happened a while back. I had purchased a Bodycon dress from asos.com which was my first and only order I made at the time. I received the dress and I loved it. But, a few months later I was just randomly checking my credit card account and right at the top of my summary showed that I had made a purchase from them. Which I did not!! The purchase was over $63.00!! I immediately filed a dispute with my credit company and was able to get my money back and at the same time, deleted my asos account. Do not sign up for this company!

Title: Great Delivery
Review: Great online shop with veeery fast delivery!

Title: Wrong item shipped and no replacement service available due to a glitch
Review: I ordered a maternity coat on short order for an upcoming trip with expedited shipping. I stayed home all day waiting for the delivery so I wouldn't miss it. It arrived and is not at all what I ordered. I then contacted their customer service and was informed that their replacement service had a "glitch" so they could not send out a replacement item. So now I have to waste more of my time returning the wrong product back to them and go search elsewhere for this much needed coat. Very frustrating experience and will not be ordering from them again. Also of note -- the coat that did come is of TERRIBLE quality and when I was searching in vain for the coat I wanted, I found it for 30 quid cheaper from the manufacturer's site (although sold out unfortunately). I can't recommend ASOS.
